translation: 一群加尔文派学者将圣经译成了波兰语。学者们使用了已知的最原始资料，毫无疑问这项工作十分细致。然而以发展的眼光来看波兰民众会更易接触到新教教义，这就太可怕了。我们的一些贵族已经是加尔文派的信徒了，而路德宗在平民中传播许久。

original: The fate of the Collegium Hosianum
After the change of state religion in our country the Collegium Hosianum has suspended activity and the professors are looking for work elsewhere.
translation: 在我国变更国教之后霍休斯神学院暂停所有活动，教授们都在另谋高就。

original: The Teutonic Knights may not be our greatest friends even now but the strong historical rivalry between our two countries is now a thing of the past.
translation: 条顿骑士团虽然算不是我们的至交，但至少我们两国之间历史上的敌对状态已是过去时。
瓦迪斯瓦夫三世的后继者

original: The death of the childless King Wladyslaw III on the battlefield of Varna split the union between Poland and Hungary and left Poland in an interregnum. His brother Kazimierz, the Grand Duke of Lithuania, was asked by the Polish nobility to assume the throne but found their conditions unacceptable. In 1447, after three years of negotiations, Kazimierz was finally crowned King of Poland on his own terms and ruled both kingdoms as a union.
translation: 无子的瓦迪斯瓦夫三世在瓦尔纳战场上驾崩之后，波兰与匈牙利的共主联邦破裂，并给波兰留下一段空位期。波兰贵族推举其弟立陶宛大公卡齐米日为王，但卡齐米日并未接受贵族开出的条件。1447年，经过三年谈判之后，卡齐米日最终登基为波兰国王，将两国作为联邦，同时统治。
我们需要一名雅盖隆家族的人！

original: Let us appoint a local noble instead.

Out of war we come, for the war our hearts beat. We the sons of neverending plains were not made to sit idle. Lives of peasants or traders are for those that are to be ruled, not for those who wish to rule.
translation: 战而生我，我为战生。我等乃浩瀚原野之子。空闲非我本，天生当驰骋。农商皆下等，我为人上人。

original: If I had one scalp, for every time...
translation: 如果我每次都有人头皮当战利品的话...

original: Can you not see the benefits, though?
While the settlers cover behind their tall walls and starve in fear our host is our people. Hordes fear no war, hordes live for war.
translation: 我们人人皆兵，而移民躲在高墙之后又饿又怕。游牧部落无惧战争，游牧部落生而为战。

original: Send our spies to infiltrate their strongholds.
translation: 派间谍渗透他们的要塞。

original: This is a Good Day to Die
translation: 今天是个赴死的好日子

original: Rumors of our glorious military exploits spread to our neighbors both near and far. Bands of strong young warriors pour across the tribal lands into our service, in search of life of glory and plunder.
translation: 我们光辉的战绩已经远近闻名。年轻而强壮的战士们扎堆越过了部落的土地来为我们服务，以寻求荣耀和战利品。
实在是再好不过的消息了。

original: Have them train the next generation instead.
translation: 让他们成为下一批受训者

original: A friendly tribe with blood ties to our own has crossed our border and settled in the open lands of [friendly_tribe_province.GetName]. Among these herdsmen live excellent and tough warriors and hunters, willing to answer the call to arms of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 一支具有血缘关系的友好部落越过了我们的边境，定居在[friendly_tribe_province.GetName]的开阔土地上。这些牧民中有着优秀的战士和猎人，他们愿意响应[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的号召。

original: A hostile tribe from [hostile_migrating_tribes_country.GetName] has crossed into [hostile_migrating_tribes_province.GetName], raiding and pillaging our people. Before our hosts could hunt them down they disappeared back into their cursed homeland carrying with them countless slaves and sizeable loot.
translation: 一支来自[hostile_migrating_tribes_country.GetName]的敌对部落侵入了[hostile_migrating_tribes_province.GetName]，劫掠我们的人民。在我们的军队追杀他们之前，他们就撤回了他们该死的老家，带走了无数奴隶和巨额战利品。

original: A huge tribe of herders has settled in one of our provinces. Friendly and willing to acknowledge our rule, these people will bring economic benefits in the long run.
translation: 一支庞大的的牧羊部落定居在我们的某个省份。他们友好的承认我们的统治，这些人将会带来长期的经济利益。

original: A big clan of sheep herdsmen has migrated into one of our border provinces searching for better pastures and milder winters. Peaceful in nature they are willing to accept our rule and pay the tribute.
translation: 一支庞大的的牧羊部落定居在我们的某个省份，为了寻求更佳的牧草和躲避寒冬。他们和平的表示愿意接受我们的统治并向我们朝贡。
更多的羊毛，听起来不错。

original: A huge event in the daily life of steppe dwellers is about to take place. Warriors from places both far and near will gather in our capital to participate in a display of skill. Horseback archery, strength contests and agility challenges will take place and may give birth to new champions and legends.
translation: 举办竞赛是草原居民日常生活中的一件大事。远近的战士们都为了一展所能，聚集到我们的首都参加竞赛。项目有骑射、斗力和赛敏，可能会产生新的冠军和传奇。

original: Rejoice! Our glorious Khan [Root.Monarch.GetName] has won the close combat contest. How shall we remember the performance?
translation: 庆祝吧！我们荣耀的大汗[Root.Monarch.GetName]赢得了近身肉搏比赛。我们该为牢记这一精彩表现做点什么？

original: Our war games have been a full success: both domestic and warriors from afar have displayed their skill and knowledge of warfare. We have many new champions and legends, and all shall remember this event for generations to come.
translation: 我们的战争比赛取得了大成功：无论是本地还是远道而来的战士们都精彩的表现了他们的个人技巧和对战事的知识。我们有很多新冠军和传奇，所有人都应当牢记这一时刻并将万古流芳。

original: Oh horrors! As the war games started, two members of feuding clans started a squabble that got out of control and turned into massive brawl. Before our palace guards could stop them, the arena pit was damaged, and two large pagodas set on fire, ruining the rest of this event!
translation: 噢太可怕了！当战争比赛开始时，两支长期不和的部族从初始的争吵逐渐失控，而演变为了群殴。在我们的宫廷守卫制止他们之前，竞技场就被破坏了。两座巨大的宝塔失火，火势吞噬了四周！

original: The whole event went better than we could ever have hoped for! Every single contest turned out to be a contest of bitter rivalry with opponents of matching skill pitted against each other. So impressed were our elders, that after the event even the oldest among them could not remember a more successful games!
translation: 整个赛事的进展比我们所期望的还要好得多！每项都激发了双方的竞争意识，使他们全身心投入比赛。连我们长老中的最长者都声称这次的成功前无古人！

original: Hearing the rumors that our mighty hosts are being depleted of manpower young warriors emerge from the deepest parts of our realm, flocking into our armies. Some seek the life of nomadic warriors and mercenaries, others merely the loot.
translation: 在听说我们兵员枯竭后，从草原最深处涌现了一批年轻战士加入了我们的军队。一些人寻求游牧战士和雇佣军的生活，另外的则想抢夺战利品。

original: May the sons join their fathers.

Enraged with the current state of peace and lack of raiding and looting an entire clan, comprised mostly of highly experienced warriors and huntsmen has left our horde and went on to join one of our neighbors instead.
translation: 一个由大部分经验老道的战士和猎人组成的部族离开了我们部落，取而代之投靠我们的邻居。目前国家和平安宁，长久没有进行远征和掠夺激怒了他们。

original: One of our tribal leaders has displayed great skill at arms during our recent war games. Many clansmen suggest that he would make a superb general to lead our host. Should we announce the promotion?
translation: 我们部落的领导人之一在最近的战争中表现出极为优秀的军事才能。许多部民提议他成为大帅领导我们的军队。我们应当这么做吗？

original: One of our tribal leaders has displayed a legendary skill at arms during our recent war games. Many clansmen and tribal elders suggest that he would make a superb general to lead our host. Should we grant this promotion?
translation: 我们部落的领导人之一在最近的战争中表现出奇迹般的军事才能。许多部民提议他成为大帅领导我们的军队。我们应当这么做吗？

original: During the height of the summer festivities in our capital members of two feuding tribes have decided to have a public showdown and fight it out in front of the entire political and religious leadership of our state! The ensuing violence was so fierce that not only the feuding tribesmen lost their lives, but also countless bystanders and even members of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s guard.
translation: 在盛夏之时的首都，两个长期不和的部族决定公开决胜，他们在我国所有政治和宗教领导人的面前决一雌雄！随后发生的暴力景象惨不忍睹，不但冲突双方都损兵折将而且无数的旁观者甚至是[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的卫兵都被牵连了。
宵小之徒怎敢如此放肆！

original: During the height of the summer festivities in our capital members of two feuding tribes have decided to have a public showdown and fight it out in front of the entire political and religious leadership of our state! In the chaos of the ensuing violence, someone murdered $HEIR$, our heir!
translation: 在盛夏之时的首都，两个长期不和的部族决定公开决胜，他们在我国所有政治和宗教领导人的面前决一雌雄！随后场面十分混乱，某人谋杀了我们的继承人！

original: While on a hunt [Root.Heir.GetName], our designated heir, was ambushed by a band of unknown assassins. Outnumbered and attacked from cover all but one fell there and then. The survivor, though wounded by a poison arrow, lived long enough to tell us of a valiant last stand of [Root.Heir.GetName]. Tall and mighty he stood, cutting the creatures of the night one by one as they surrounded him, until the last of his body guards succumbed. Shaken and in mourning, our people celebrate the legacy of [Root.Heir.GetName] as he achieves immortality in their memory.
translation: 在一场狩猎中，我国的钦点继承人[Root.Heir.GetName]遭到了一群不明身份刺客的伏击。在人数压制和偷袭的双重打击下，所有人都倒下了。只有一个被毒箭射伤的幸存者来得及告诉我们：[Root.Heir.GetName]奋战到最后一刻。他高大而威猛，一个接一个的砍杀正包围着他的敌人直到最后一个贴身护卫倒下。怀着震惊和哀痛的心情，[Root.Heir.GetName]的不朽事迹将在人民之间传诵。

original: Our armies are so small and pathetic that not only the elders but even local tribal rulers dare to tarnish the name of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 我们的军队规模小得可怜，以至于不仅长老们甚至地方部族的统治者都敢侮辱我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]之名.

original: Ignore the rabble, a dog that barks won't bite.
translation: 无视这些宵小，会咬人的狗不叫。

original: Our armies are so small and pathetic that many tribal leaders and elders are openly questioning our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s ability to lead us.
translation: 我们的军队规模小得可怜以至于许多部族领导人和长老都公开质疑我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]是否有能力统帅大家。

original: Our armies are so small and pathetic that our commanders are starting to wonder whether their service has any point at all.
translation: 我们的军队规模小得可怜以至于我们的指挥官开始怀疑他们的服务是否正确。

original: Our armies are so small and pathetic that our commanders are starting to wonder whether their service has any point at all. Demoralized by the lack of any prospect for the glorious life of raiding and looting, the men are starting to leave our hosts, and instead go to other tribes or form local bands of looters and bandits.
translation: 我们的军队规模小得可怜以至于我们的指挥官开始怀疑他们的服务是否正确。长期没有享受远征和掠夺带来的荣耀使得士气低迷，人们开始离开我们的军队为其他部族效力，甚至成为了土匪和强盗。

original: War, What is it Good For

As they were standing on top of a hill, observing our almighty hosts marching on into the enemy's land, a servant approaches our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], looks him in the eye and asks: 'War, what is it good for?' to which our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] replies: 'Absolutely everything.'
translation: 当他们站在山顶时，一名随从正看着我们强大的军队挺进敌人的领土。他拜见我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，问道：“战争，它有什么好处呢？”。我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]答道：“战争自有千钟粟，战争自有颜如玉，战争自有黄金屋。”

original: The mounted warriors that dominate both our society and our armies have grown weary of our tendency to emulate the settled peoples. Our destiny is to rule the weak sedentary populations not to make their weaknesses our own.
translation: 统治我们社会与军队的马上战士们因模仿定居民的习俗而开始堕落。我朝当统治这些懦弱的定居民，而不是变得和他们一样弱。

original: Our ancestors where nomads and our society remain dominated by a mounted martial class but over time we have come to see that there is much to be learned from our neighbors. While we are far from abandoning the traditions of our predecessors our armies will develop along the lines of our settled neighbors as our society evolves.
translation: 我们祖先是牧民，我们的社会仍由骑射阶级统治，但也要看到，我们邻居们有很多可学之处。随着我们社会的进步，同先辈们的传统远离越远时，我们的军队将采取和定居的邻居们一样的战法。
竞争对手奥斯坦德公司

original: While primarily made up of Flemish, English and Dutch captains and investors the Ostende company has become a growing source of income for the Austrian state.
translation: 奥斯坦德公司的船长和投资者大部分都是佛兰德人、英国人和荷兰人。公司在奥地利的国家收入占比中份额越来越大。

original: The Black Chamber of Vienna is infamous. All mail coming and going to or through Vienna is opened, read and copied in short time by the Kanzlei. The mail is always resealed in the right envelopes and translators and cryptologists stand ready to decipher the copied messages. There are rumors that mix-ups have occurred, it is claimed that the duke of Modena once received the contents a letter meant for the duke of Parma. Given how efficient and careful the copyists at the Kanzlei are it is hard to know if this was really a mistake or just meant as a healthy reminder to the dukes...
translation: 维也纳的情报机关非常著名。所有往来途径维也纳的邮件都会被情报机关很快的拆封、阅读和复制。邮件总会重新封装和翻译，密码破译员在旁随时准备着将复制的文本破译。有传言说混淆的事情也发生过，摩德纳公爵有次收到本应给帕尔玛公爵的信件。考虑到情报机关抄写员的办事效率和工作态度，难以搞清这是否真的是出了差错还是意味着给公爵们的健康提个醒...

original: Melchior Klesl, a fervent champion of the Counter-Reformation has been made part of our privy council.
translation: 梅尔希奥·克莱西，这位热衷于反对宗教改革的战士成为了我们秘密议会的一员。

original: Vienna has been hit by a great pestilence from which it is slowly recovering.
translation: 一场规模巨大的鼠疫侵袭了维也纳，瘟疫恢复的十分缓慢。

original: The Schwaz Silver Mine is perhaps the most productive in all of Europe.
translation: 施瓦茨银矿的产量可能是欧洲之冠。

original: Our ruler has adopted a policy of consistent centralization of the Austrian lands.
translation: 我们的统治者接受了坚持奥地利集权化的政策。

original: While new deposits of silver had been found in the Schwaz mining district by the early 15th century production have not begun to pick up until now. Greater and greater quantities are being taken out of the mines and with the annual extraction reaching 11 tonnes the area has gained a reputation as the biggest silver mine in Europe.
translation: 15世纪早期施瓦茨矿区就探明有新的白银储量，直到现在才开始开采。从矿场开采的银矿数量大得惊人，每年达11吨的开采量使矿区赢得了欧洲最大银矿的美名。

original: The lands ruled by $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ are diverse and many follow different laws and rules. A major step towards a centralized state was taken today as the first all-Austrian diet convened. While the Diet itself didn't achieve a great deal it nonetheless marks a major breakthrough on the way towards a unified Austrian country.
translation: $MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCH$的施政各不相同，很多采取了截然不同的法律和政策。第一次全奥地利议会是向集权国家迈进的伟大进步。议会本身并没有达成什么重要的成果，尽管如此却标志着这是奥地利国家统一的重要突破。

original: A city as important and well connected as Vienna will always be vulnerable to epidemics and has seen many of them come and go through the centuries. The plague outbreak of $YEAR$ is, however, something quite out of the ordinary. The disease has struck our city very hard and some say a third of the population is now dead or dying. As the people in other European cities brace themselves for the inevitable spread the term 'Viennese Death' has become firmly rooted abroad. As he flees the city $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ vows to construct a Mercy Column when the city is finally free of this pestilence.
translation: 维也纳地位重要并且四通八达，因此在这里流行病容易传播，几个世纪来都有很多先例。然而$YEAR$大瘟疫的爆发十分不同寻常。疾病击垮了我们的城市，有人说三分之一的人口已死亡或者濒临死亡。这场灾难不可避免的向欧洲其他城市扩散，向国外的传播已不可阻挡。人们强撑着病体称之为“维也纳死神”。当$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCH$撤离城市时，他发誓在瘟疫退去之后建造一根怜悯柱。

original: Finally free of the plague, the time has come for our $MONARCHTITLE$ to make good on [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] pledge to erect a Mercy Column. The only real choice we have is what the column should look like. As a symbol of a fresh start, architects have suggested we make the column as modern as possible, a high baroque monument. Others, however, feel that the only proper way to mourn the dead is a more restrained, conservative column without pretentions to be on the forefront of architectural style.
translation: 最终瘟疫退去了，我们的$MONARCHTITLE$这时践行了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]誓言，树立一根怜悯柱。我们唯一要选择的是该把它造成什么式样。作为一个重新开始的象征，建筑师们建议我们造的越具现代感越好，建成高大的巴洛克式纪念柱。然而另外一群人觉得唯有更严肃保守的纪念柱能够哀悼逝者，而不是追求站在艺术前沿。

original: Let us build a Grand Column
translation: 让我们建造伟大的纪念柱

original: Rather than relying on single individuals states are now increasingly relying on institutions to carry out their espionage. All over Europe Black Chambers, tasked with the procurement, opening and decrypting of foreign as well as domestic correspondence have quietly been created.\nThe one in Vienna, the Geheime Kabinettskanzlei, is, however, something out of the ordinary. By those in the know the Viennese Black Chamber is famed for the speed with which it regularly opens, copies and then decrypts and translates all mail it can get its hands on.
translation: 国家现在越来越依靠完整的体系来查获间谍而不是单一的个人。负责获取、揭露和解密国内外通讯的情报机关悄悄的在全欧各地建立了。\n然而维也纳的秘密机要处与众不同。维也纳秘密机要处以迅速有序的揭露、复制、解密和翻译手上所有能拿到的邮件而闻名。

original: Himself the son of Protestant parents, Melchior Klesl seems to have an impressive ability to sway Protestant converts back to the Holy Catholic Church. Wherever Klesl is sent the Reformation retreats and Klesl will move on to a new city of Protestant converts to recatholize. Klesl seems intent to make the Counter-Reformation his life's work and will continue even at the risk of his own safety.
translation: 梅尔希奥·克莱西的双亲信仰新教，他拥有强大的说服力能够让新教徒重归神圣的天主教教会。克莱西被派往的地方新教都会败退，然后他会被派往新的城市让新教徒重拾信仰。克莱西将反宗教改革作为毕生的事业，甚至不惜自己的人身安全。

original: We have need of this man on the privy council.
translation: 我们的秘密议会需要这个人。

original: That is great to hear, we must not keep him from his work.
translation: 这听起来太好了，我们无需让他从工作中分心。

original: Textiles have always been produced in Upper Austria though perhaps not on a very large scale. The output has, however, been sufficient to cover the need of the region itself and among the population skilled weavers can be found. Foreign investors now consider this area as ripe for investment and North German merchants believe that the region could grow even richer if textile production was promoted more through a putting-out system.
translation: 尽管规模不大，但上奥地利一直出产纺织品。纺织品的产量能够满足地区本身的需求，在人群中也能找到有技巧的纺织工人。目前外国投资者认为这地区投资机会已然成熟，北德商人相信如果当地采用分包制会促进纺织品的生产而更为富有。

original: No, the peasants should not be preoccupied with such things.
translation: 这种行当应该让农民做。

original: The riches of the East Indies seem to be without end and the Dutch and English are growing richer and richer by simply bringing Chinese and Indian goods all the way to the European markets. Today a number of Dutch and English captains as well as Flemish merchants approached $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ and asked for a royal charter of their own. They claim to have the necessary expertise and starting capital themselves already and only ask for a Royal Charter so that they may compete with the other India Companies without being considered renegades or pirates. In return the company shall be based in the Austrian Netherlands and will allow us to take part in the Indian and Chinese riches.
translation: 东印度公司的财富看上去无穷无尽，荷兰和英国人通过简单的将中国和印度的货物运送到欧洲就变得越来越富有。今天一群荷兰和英国船长随同弗兰德商人拜见$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCH$寻求皇家特许。他们宣称拥有必要的专业知识和启动资金，仅仅来寻求皇家特许使他们能够和其他的印度公司竞争，而不会被误认为是叛徒或者海盗。作为回报公司本部设在奥属尼德兰并与我们参股印度和中国的财产。

original: We cannot risk angering our neighbors.
translation: 我们不能冒风险激怒我们的邻居。

original: Demands to close down the Ostende Company

While still young the Ostende Company has done better than anyone in $CAPITAL_CITY$ expected. The Company may lack the financial muscle of the older India Companies but the Ostende Company has still managed to do very well in some areas. Last year half of the tea exported to Europe was transported by Ostende ships.\nThe success of the Company has, however, not made us any friends. The English and Dutch both claim that the Ostende Company is a sham set up by their disloyal subjects masquerading as Austrian/Flemish sailors. They show little understanding for our desire to get in on the India trade and as long as the Company operates they will hold it against us. In $CAPITAL_CITY$ some sympathize with them, our country has never been a naval power and this all seems like an unnecessary adventure to them.
translation: 年轻的奥斯坦德公司在 $CAPITAL_CITY$ 的作为超出了所有人的预期。和那些成立已久的印度公司相比，奥斯坦德公司可能缺乏经济实力，但是依然设法在一些领域做得非常出色。去年半数出口到欧洲的茶叶都是是通过奥斯坦德的船队运输的。\n然而公司的成功引起了一些人的嫉妒。英国和荷兰都宣称奥斯坦德公司是他们不忠诚的下属们伪装成奥地利或者荷兰水手建立的山寨公司。他们不理解我们对印度贸易的渴望，并且只要公司开门一天他们都会以这个把柄反对我们。在 $CAPITAL_CITY$ 一些人同情他们，我们的国家也从来都不是海军强国，对这些反对者来说这一切看起来都是不必要的冒险。

original: Let us not bow to such threats.
translation: 不要因如此威胁而卑躬屈膝。

original: The Controversy over the Chinese Rites
This is the location of St Paul's College where most Jesuits bound for Asia are trained and instructed in how to deal with the Asian population.
translation: 大部分派往亚洲的耶稣会士都会在圣保罗学院接受训练和教育如何处理与亚洲人的关系。

original: The Jesuit Matteo Ricci is currently at the court of our monarch, greatly enhancing our knowledge of cartography and astronomy.
translation: 耶稣会士利玛窦目前正在宫中，极大的丰富了我们制图学和天文学的知识。

original: One of our ministers has close contacts with the Christian missionaries and is trying to find ways to combine Chinese and Western science.
translation: 我们的大臣中有人和基督教传教士走的很近，正在寻求将中西方科学结合的方法。

original: An unusual Jesuit has approached the Imperial Court. Matteo Ricci dresses like a Chinese, has adopted many Chinese customs and talks in a way similar to the Chinese. A scholar as well as a missionary Ricci seems to be as interested in the customs, cartography and science of the Chinese world as he is to inform them of his own. This does mean that Ricci has had a lot more success than many of his brethren when it comes to attracting converts but his skills, especially relating to astronomy and cartography could undoubtedly come of use to us. Shall we allow him to stay at our court?
translation: 一名不同寻常的耶稣会士来到了帝国宫廷。玛提欧·利奇（利玛窦）的穿戴就像一个中国人，也接受了很多中国风俗习惯，中国话也说得很好。如其所言，作为一名学者同时也是传教士的利玛窦热衷研究风俗习惯、制图学、天文学和中国的科学。利玛窦比他的同胞们更为成功，他们本是来传教的。但是他的技术，特别是关于制图学和天文学的技术毫无疑问对我们帮助很大。我们应该允许他待在宫中吗？

original: The result of a long and arduous work combining European and Chinese maps of the world Matteo Ricci and his Chinese collaborators have presented us with 'Kunyu Wanguo Quantu' or 'a map of the myriad of countries of the world'. The map itself is a wealth of information to us and has given us much more detailed knowledge of kingdoms and people's far from our borders.
translation: 在漫长又艰辛的努力下，利玛窦和他的中国合作者将欧洲和中国地图整合了，称之为“坤舆万国全图”或者“万国图志”。地图本身对于我们来说就是一种信息资源的财富，我们以此了解普天之外遥远的国家和人们的知识。

original: A Jesuit missionary named Alessandro Valignano has created a college in the European enclave in Macau to among other things educate his brethren in Chinese language and customs. The Jesuits have become convinced that the way to approach the Chinese people is by learning to act and fit in among them.\nIt comes as no surprise to us that these foreigners would like to emulate us but it is possible this will make their preaching reach a larger part of our population.
translation: 一位叫做亚历山德罗·瓦利尼亚诺（范礼安）的耶稣会传教士在欧洲人的飞地澳门创办了一所学院，用来教育他的同胞汉语和中国的风俗习惯。耶稣会深信与中国人打好关系的方法是深入人群学习中国人的言行举止。\n外国人模仿我们这件事对我们来说并不奇怪，但是这也可能使他们的传教活动在更多的人群中扩展。

original: Exert pressure to have the College closed.

So far contacts between our church and the Chinese have been handled exclusively by the Jesuits. In order to approach the Chinese the order has learnt their customs, their language and in general tried to be a part of Chinese society.\nWith the arrival of Dominicans and Franciscans in China, however, disturbing reports have begun to reach us. It seems the Jesuits are tolerating a very high degree of non-Christian rituals among the supposedly converted Chinese. The other orders are abhorred by the Jesuit conduct and by their supposedly Christian converts and have urged us to make a clear statement that the Chinese Ancestor rites have no place among Christians and that anyone who wishes to join our Church must abandon such things.
translation: 到目前为止我们的教会和中国人之间的唯一交流渠道是通过耶稣会士。为了接触中国人，耶稣会学习了他们的习俗和语言，总之来说要设法成为中国社会的一员。\n随着道明会和方济会抵达中国，令人不安的报告接踵而来。对于那些可能接受福音的中国人，耶稣会看起来对非基督教仪式的容忍度十分高。其他的修会被耶稣会和支持耶稣会的潜在中国教众所敌视。他们劝阻我们并发表了一则明确声明表示：中国人的祭祖仪式不应该在基督教信徒中占有一席之地，任何想要加入我们教会的人都要摒弃这样的习俗。

original: Rule in favor of the Jesuits.
Rule in favor of the Dominicans.

translation: 中华礼仪不是基督徒应有的

original: There has been much debate among the Christians in our country about whether the traditional Chinese Rites are to be seen as compatible with their religion. Many of the Europeans, especially newcomers, seem to find these rites distasteful and today we have been reached by the news that their leader in Rome has forbidden all Chinese Christians from performing these traditional rites.
translation: 传统中华礼仪是否能和基督教信仰共处引起了广泛的争论。很多欧洲人尤其是新来者，看起来很讨厌这些礼仪。今天我们收到消息称他们在罗马的领袖已经禁止了所有中国基督教徒举行传统礼仪。

original: Missionaries that don't respect our traditions will be expelled!
translation: 不尊重我们习俗的传教士将会被驱逐出境！

original: We have need of these missionaries.
The Westerners bicker about Chinese Traditions
translation: 西方人有关中国传统的争论

original: There has been much debate among the Christians in our country about whether the traditional Chinese Rites are to be seen as compatible with their religion. Many of the Europeans, especially the newcomers, seem to find them distasteful. This is quite a lot to stomach from such barbarians, even if they seem to have decided now to 'tolerate' these Chinese customs.
translation: 传统中华礼仪是否能和基督教信仰共处引起了广泛的争论。很多欧洲人尤其是新来者，看起来很讨厌这些礼仪。即使这些人现在决定“容忍”中国风俗，但忍受这群蛮夷已经够了。

original: Missionaries that don't respect our traditions will be expelled!
translation: 不尊重我们习俗的传教士将会被驱逐出境！

original: Stops conversions to Christianity in China.
translation: 停止在中国传播基督教。

original: We have need of these missionaries.

The continued presence of Christian missionaries in China has not been without effect. A number of inhabitants in one of our provinces have increasingly come under the sway of Christian missionaries and by now Christianity has managed to become the dominant religion in the area.
translation: 基督教传教士在中国的持续活动不能说没有影响。目前在传教士的影响下转信的人数持续增多，基督教在这一地区已成为优势宗教。

original: Christianity, a faith for the Emperor?

Christianity has become more and more accepted among our subjects and $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ counts Christian missionaries among his closest confidents in the capital. Recently even our mother has converted to this foreign religion. Perhaps the time has come to convert to this Roman faith? Apart from the theological implications we would surely find many new friends among the kingdoms of the West.
translation: 基督教在受众中越来越流行，$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCH$认为传教士是他在首都最为信任的近臣。最近甚至我们的母后也改信这个外国宗教。可能是时候改宗这个罗马的信仰？除了神学上的影响以外，我们肯定在与西方的交往中找到很多新盟友。

original: It seems one of the ministers at our court has become fascinated by the culture and knowledge of the missionaries from the West. While we do stand to gain from the insights our minister has gained through the contacts he has made his recent conversion to Christianity is perhaps a bit too much to stomach.
translation: 我们宫廷中的一名大臣变得醉心于传教士带来的西方文化和知识。虽然我们能从他与传教士的交流中拓展视野，但是他最近改宗基督教有点无法令人接受。

original: As long as he does his job.
translation: 只要他干好本职工作就行。

original: Our capital is currently undergoing a very ambitious renovation project.
translation: 我们的首都正在进行一次非常有野心的改造项目。

original: After our restructuring of Cusco the city is greater than it ever has been before. A true capital of a hegemonic Andean Empire.
translation: 经过我们对库斯科的重建，城市比以往更加伟大。这是安第斯帝国真正的伟大首都。

original: The estate of our ruler is something out of the ordinary. Machu Picchu is a small city in itself and a great example of Incan architecture.
translation: 我们统治者的产业不同寻常。马丘比丘是一座小城，但也是印加建筑艺术的典范。

original: The various idols worshiped by the many people under our rule have all found one home in our capital. Here they are protected from any harm that might come to them and here their worshippers can see them if they should so wish. Controlling the idols of our subjects is of course also not a bad thing if they should ever forget who is in charge.
translation: 在我们统治下，不同种族的多种偶像崇拜都能在我们的首都找到安居的地方。这里他们可以免除任何对他们的伤害，而他们的崇拜者可以和他们沟通，如果他们愿意。控制我们附庸的偶像也不是件坏事，这样他们可以不要忘了自己是身份。

original: As the oldest of the Andean states still in existence the Chimu people are carriers of an older culture. Their court life is more elaborate, their artisans more skilled and their administrative methods more advanced than ours in many ways. We have therefore elected to attempt to integrate as much of their culture as possible with ours. This does put some strain on our administration but it allows us to achieve things we otherwise would not.
translation: 安第斯诸族中最古老的一支，奇穆人是一种古老文化的传承者。他们的宫廷政治更加复杂，艺术家更加有姿势水平，管理技术也比我们更加先进。我们被选择要试图尽量融合他们和我们的文化。这会让我们的统治带来一定的压力，但是不这么做我们会一事无成。

original: No Chimu is allowed to serve in the Incan armies and the Chimu men that would be suitable for such a task are instead sent out to the far corners of our realm to settle, perform various tasks for the central administration and in general spread their culture.
translation: 印加帝国不允许奇穆人服役，即使有适合当兵的奇穆人也会被送到帝国的偏远角落，承担各种中央委派的任务，主要是散播文化。

original: This province is devastated by an outbreak of smallpox.
translation: 这个省份被天花爆发给摧毁了.

original: Our heir once took part in a great journey to far-away lands. The experience he, and the crews of the vessels he brought with him, gained during that trip is now being put to good use to improve the seafaring skills of our people.
translation: 我们的王储参与了一次远航。他和船员在航行中获取的经验将对我们民众的航海技术很有帮助。

original: Fall of the Chanka & the Rise of Cusco
translation: 昌卡的衰落和库斯科的崛起

original: After years of struggles and having been dangerously close to total defeat by the Chankas in 1438 the kingdom of Cusco has now risen to a greater position than it has ever had previously. Having saved the kingdom, the young king Pachacuti went on to conquer the Chanka kingdom itself shortly afterwards, a state that for long times has exacted tribute not only from Cusco but from many of the states in the Andean world since the fall of the old Wari Empire.\nApart from marking Pachacuti as the greatest leader of the Cusco kingdom to date, the fall of the Chankas have given us access to their great treasury, a huge collection of gifts from neighbors and tributaries. This is exactly the kind of capital needed to buy the services necessary to reform and expand our kingdom. At this point nobody knows Pachacuti's plans but what is certain is that he has the means to steer Cusco in whichever direction he could wish.
translation: 经过多年的挣扎，甚至曾经差点被昌卡人在1438年彻底打败，库斯科王国已经崛起，进入到它史上最强的时期。拯救了国家的年轻国王帕查库特克随后很快地征服了查卡王国，它曾经在瓦里帝国崩溃后很长一段时期内向包括库斯科在内的许多国家收取贡金\n除了作为库斯科帝国史上最强的国王被载入史册，昌卡的衰落给了我们获取他们财富的机会，以及领过和附庸国的贡品。这里还是王国理想的首都，可以购买必要的服务，以及改革扩张我们的国家。在这时，没有人知道帕查库特克的计划，但有一点肯定，他掌握着王国的方向。

original: Long live Pachacuti, he who makes the Earth Shake!
translation: 帕查库特克万岁！他让大地颤抖！
库斯科 - 世界的中心

original: One of the first things on Pachacuti's agenda is the reshaping of Cusco. While our capital has served its purpose over the years it is in many ways no more than a rural village, often flooded by nearby rivers. Such a city is no longer fitting for a kingdom with ambitions such as ours. By creating a small model version of the city $MONARCH$ has drawn up plans for an entire redesign of the city, necessitating the complete evacuation of the city for the duration of the project.\nWhile the manpower and material needed for this project are readily available inside our new borders mobilizing the various chiefs under our control entails a generous use of gifts and feasts. That is, however, a price we will have to pay for our new capital.
translation: 帕查库特克的第一项日程就是改革库斯科。我们的首都已经履行使命很多年了，但是它很大程度上只是个小村子，经常被周边河流的洪水淹没。这个地方配不上我们帝国的野望。通过规划了一个城市的小模型，$MONARCH$描绘了重新设计城市的蓝图，这将导致城市居民在整个重建过程中疏散开。\n项目所需的人力和材料可以在我们新疆界内部自给自足，动员各个地方的附庸酋长需要慷慨的散播大量的礼物和宴席。不过这是新都建设所必须付出的代价。

original: Let us create a worthy capital!
Our resources are better used for other things.
translation: 还是把资源用在其他上面.

original: After almost 20 years the great project of restructuring Cusco is complete. The land has been leveled to create huge plazas and beautiful buildings erected, the nearby rivers have been led into canals.\nThe city is built to be the capital of an Empire rather than a small kingdom and is organized into four regions matching the way which we divide our realm in the Andes. The royal centre is located at the junction of the regions of Antisuyu, Qullasuyu, Kuntisuyu and Chinchaysuyu and these regions divide the Cusco valley as well as our empire.
translation: 经过差不多20年的努力，库斯科的重建完工了。土地上建设有大广场和美妙的建筑，近处的河流被引入运河中。\n这座城市是为一个大帝国所建，而非一个小小的王国。它被规划为四个区域，和我们划分安第斯区域的划分相对应。王城坐落在四个区域的中心，这种划分延伸到整个帝国。

original: Just as the city of Cusco was in need of being reshaped in order to fit the wider ambition of the Cusco kingdom $MONARCH$ is now in need of a stately Estate to match the importance of his person and his lineage. On a mountain completely surrounded by the Urubamba river $MONARCH$ has planned the city of Machu Picchu, a royal retreat for his court and his Panaca and a beautiful place for a ruler of his magnitude to reside in.
translation: 库斯科已被重建，以符合我们国王$MONARCH$的野望，现在需要一个庄严的领地来荣耀他个人和他的宗族。在一个被乌鲁班巴河环绕的山上，$MONARCH$规划了马丘比丘城，一个专为他的宫廷和帕纳卡的疗养所，同样也是一处符合他地位的美好住处。

original: Let us build a great city!
translation: 让我们建设这座伟大城市!

original: The Huacas and the Royal Temple.

With the growth of our realm it has come to encompass many chiefdoms and in these chiefdoms various Huacas, local idols, are worshiped. Though it might seem a bit unorthodox a truly Andean realm should strive to incorporate all of these idols in its central place of worship.\nWe should make a room in our royal temple for the Huacas of our subjects so that they can honor them when they come to $CAPITAL_CITY$. Some might say that this is to take their gods as hostages, but surely this is just a sign of how inclusive our empire has become?
translation: 随着我们王国的扩张，我们逐渐会包括许多的部落，而这些部落崇拜着各种不同的当地神明，胡阿卡。尽管这看上去不太正统，但是一个真正的安第斯国家会努力把这些神明集中到一起来祭拜。\n我们应该在我们的皇家神庙里留出我们附庸的胡阿卡的位置，这样当他们来到$CAPITAL_CITY$时就可以祭拜这些神明。有些人会说这是把他们的神作为质子，但显然这不正显示了我们帝国是多么包容？

original: Move the Huacas to the Temple.
Let them keep their petty gods.
translation: 让他们保留他们卑微的神明。

original: The coastal Chimu people are the carriers of one of the oldest cultures in the Andes. As their lands have now come under our control we cannot help but marvel at the works of their artisans and craftsmen. The Chimu silversmiths, weavers and ceramicists are producing treasures such as we have never seen before.\nThe arrival of these treasures as well as many of the craftsmen themselves in our royal capital is now celebrated in great feasts. By integrating the Chimu we have created a link to the glorious past of this region and taken a necessary step on the road to a new Pan-Andean state.
translation: 沿海的奇穆人是安第斯最古老的文化之一。他们的土地现在在我们掌控之下，我们不得不惊叹于他们的手工艺人。奇穆的银匠，编制艺人和制陶艺人创造着我们从未见过的宝藏。\n我们正在用盛大的宴会庆祝这些宝藏以及这些匠人来到我们的皇宫。通过整合奇穆，我们和这个地区光荣的过去建立了联系，向着建立一个新的泛安第斯国家迈出了必要的一步。

original: Let us integrate their culture with ours.
translation: 让我们整合我们和他们的文化。

original: This is but one of many subject cultures.
translation: 这只不过是我们附属文化之一。

original: Word has reached us that the Chimu are revolting against our rule. The parts of our army that the Chimu nobles have supplied have joined the rebels and the rebellion is now growing all along the coast. The rebellion is lead by a descendant of the old Chimu rulers, Chimu Capac, and the rebels seem intent to recreate their old state.
translation: 消息传来奇穆正在反叛我们的统治。我们军队中由奇穆贵族贡献的部分也加入了叛乱，而叛乱正在整个海岸扩大。叛乱由旧奇穆的统治者奇穆卡帕克的后裔领导。他们似乎试图重建以前的国家。

original: With Chimu Capac and his nobles defeated we are once again in control of the Chimu coastline. What remains to be decided, however, is what to do with the revolters. With its old traditions and rich culture the Chimu region is perhaps likely to remain an area harder to subdue completely. On the other hand our realm owes a lot to the Chimu as their example has inspired our elites, our craftsmen and administration.\nAs their loyalties are questionable but their skills are not it has been suggested that we forbid them to serve in our armies and instead make use of the Mitma system to resettle them throughout our empire. By dispersing the Chimu as Mitmaqs they will be useful to us while at the same time unable to revolt in any meaningful way against our rule.
translation: 在奇穆卡帕克和他的贵族们被击败后，我们又一次控制了奇穆海岸。然而我们还需要绝对怎么处理这些叛乱者。由于其古老的传统和丰富的文化，奇穆地区可能很难被完全驯服。另一方面，我们国家事实上亏欠奇穆很多，因为他们的榜样曾经激励着我们的精英，工匠和管理者。\n由于他们的忠诚值得怀疑但技能不容怀疑，有人提出我们应该禁止他们在军队服役但是使用传统的密特马体制把他们迁徙到整个我们的帝国。通过把奇穆人作为密特马克分散，我们可以有效利用他们而又阻止他们有效反抗我们的统治。

original: Forbid the Chimu to serve in our armies and start resettling them.
translation: 禁止奇穆人在军队服役并开始迁徙他们。

original: The revolters must be punished where they'll feel it the most.
translation: 这些反叛者必须用最能让他们感受到方法惩罚。

original: In the wake of the arrival of foreign men and their huge beasts, strange diseases have begun to spread among our people. These alien maladies seem to haunt all classes of our society and are especially deadly for our children.
translation: 在外国人和他们巨大的野兽的到来后，奇怪的疾病开始在我们的人民中传播。这些外来的疾病似乎袭击了我们整个社会的所有阶级，特别是对我们的儿童尤其致命。

original: Is there nothing that can be done?
translation: 难道没有什么能做的么？

original: Never content to remain in one place for too long, $MONARCH$ was in many ways a likely victim to be hit by the new diseases. After a visit to some of his estates in a part of the realm close to an outbreak, he became badly affected by fever, spots and blisters, and decided to summon the lords to appoint a new heir. The Auguries where, however, not very favorable to either of his initial suggestions, and as the priests returned to the Inca for a third name to try, they found $MONARCH$ dead.\nAs word of these events reach the capital it turns out only one of the two suggested heirs is still alive. Spared by the disease, Huascar is determined to become the new Sapa Inca, and he was therefore furious to learn that, as the body of $MONARCH$ was being brought to Cusco for mummification, many nobles and generals have elected to stay away from the capital in support of a son by another mother: Atahualpa.
translation: $MONARCH$从不喜欢在一个地方呆太久，如此来看他从很多方面都很可能成为新疾病的受害者。在访问了接近一个疾病暴发中心行宫后，他开始受到高热，水泡和孢疹的困扰并最终决定找来领主们来安排一个继承人。然而各种预兆并不支持他最初的建议。当祭司们带着第三个名字来尝试时，他们发现$MONARCH$死了。\n当这些事件的消息传到首都时，两个候选继承人中只有一个在这场瘟疫中活了下来。活下来的Huascar决定成为新的萨帕·印卡。他愤怒地发现$MONARCH$的遗体被带到库斯科并制作成木乃伊。许多贵族和将军决定离开首都支持另一个母亲的孩子：Atahualpa。

original: With large parts of the nobility and the traditional Incan elite still hesitant about Huascar the new ruler has not been idle. Distrusting the loyalty of the Incan elite Huascar has surrounded himself with those who do support him, the lower nobility and foreign subjects. He has also avoided all the customary great feasts and ceremonies associated with the coming of a new ruler.\nAtahualpa on his part is doing his utmost to be seen as the very model of a traditional Incan ruler and an increasing number of the traditional elites now support him.
translation: 很大一部分的贵族和传统印加精英依然在迟疑是否要支持Huascar，新的统治者也没有闲着。由于不信任印加精英的忠诚，Huascar让一些低级贵族和国外的附庸围绕这些真正支持他的人们围绕着他。他同时也避开所有在新统治者到来时举行的礼仪性的的宴会和仪式。\n而Atahualpa则做着一个传统印加统治者的典范。所以越来越多的传统精英开始支持他。

original: We must keep our true friends close, traditions are made to be broken.
translation: 我们必须和真朋友保持密切关系，传统就是用来打破的。

original: Try to placate the traditional nobility
translation: 试着接纳一些传统的贵族。

original: We shall be everything Huascar is not.
translation: 我们必须做到所有瓦斯卡尔没做到的。

original: With the defeat of the other party and the capture of the Incan capital the civil war between Huascar and Atahualpa is now at an end. $MONARCH$ is, however, furious with those who supported his brother. He has given orders that all of his brother's kin be killed and the mummy of the originator of their lineage burned.
translation: 随着另一方的失败和占领印加首都，Huascar和Atahualpa之间的内战结束了。然而$MONARCH$对那些支持他兄弟的人很愤怒。他下令所有他兄弟的亲属都要被处决而他们宗族的木乃伊都要被焚毁。

original: Let it be known what happens to those who would defy $MONARCH$!
Let us exact more moderate retribution.
translation: 让我们用温和一些的方式报复。

original: Capture and Ransom of the Sapa Inca

In a bold raid a small group of conquistadors have managed to lure and capture the leader of the Incas. Fearful of having being burnt and thus never mummified, the Sapa Inca offered to pay a huge ransom to his captors, something the conquistadors immediately agreed to.\nThough the ransom was paid we still need to decide what to do with the Inca. To kill a king is surely a horrible crime even on the other side of the world, but our informants seem sure that the death of the Inca would strike a deadly blow to his empire.
translation: 在一次大胆的袭击中，一小股征服者伏击并抓获了印加的统治者。害怕被烧死而不是被制成木乃伊，萨帕·印卡提出付一大笔赎金来赎出自己。而征服者们立刻同意了。\n尽管赎金已经支付我们还需要决定怎么处理印加。杀死一个国王哪怕在世界的另一端也是严重的罪行，然而我们的顾问似乎很确定杀死他能对他的帝国造成致命打击。
将会激起对§Y印加§!的§Y民族主义叛乱§!。

original: Will provoke a §YSuccession Struggle§! among the §YIncas§!.
translation: 将会激起§Y印加§!的§Y继承斗争§!。

original: Capture and Ransom of the Sapa Inca

A small group of Conquistadors have managed to capture our great leader $MONARCH$ by luring him into an open plaza and scaring away his entourage using horses, cannon and firearms. This catastrophe is only made worse by the vile threat of the invaders to burn him alive and thus preventing his mummification after death. Hoping to avert this horrible faith the Sapa Inca soon ordered us to gather a huge ransom, more precious metals have been assembled than these barbarians have ever dared to dream of.\nAs news of the death of $MONARCH$ travel through the realm many of the people's subdued by the Incas in the past now see their chances to revolt and even the core areas under our control are shaken and unsure of the future. The only sliver of hope we have is that it is said that the body of $MONARCH$ was lost soon after its burial and in his death his status has already reached mythical proportions.
translation: 一小队征服者在一个开阔的广场伏击了我们伟大的领袖$MONARCH$并用马，大炮和火器吓走了他的随从。这些侵略者们威胁把他活活烧死来阻止他死后的木乃伊化，这使这场大灾难变得更糟糕了。萨帕·印卡曾试图扭转这个可怕的命运，他命令我们收集一笔巨大的赎金。这些野蛮人做梦也没有想到的巨大数量的贵金属被集中了起来。\n当$MONARCH$死亡的消息传遍整个国家，许多过去臣服于印加的人现在看到了反叛的机会，甚至在我们控制的核心区域，人们也被震慑了而看不到未来。我们唯一的希望就是据传闻$MONARCH$的遗体在被埋葬后不久消失了。这意味着在死亡时他的状态已经达到了神秘的领域。

original: Capture and Ransom of the Sapa Inca

A small group of Conquistadors have managed to capture our great leader $MONARCH$ by luring him into an open plaza and scaring away his entourage using horses, cannon and firearms. This catastrophe is only made worse by the vile threat of the invaders to burn him alive and thus preventing his mummification after death. Hoping to avert this horrible faith the Sapa Inca soon ordered us to gather a huge ransom, more precious metals have been assembled than these barbarians have ever dared to dream of.\nWith $MONARCH$ in captivity our country is as much a hostage as he is, perhaps it is time that another member of the royal family take over at-least temporarily?
translation: 一小队征服者在一个开阔的广场伏击了我们伟大的领袖$MONARCH$并用马，大炮和火器吓走了他的随从。这些侵略者们威胁把他活活烧死来阻止他死后的木乃伊化，这使这场大灾难变得更糟糕了。萨帕·印卡曾试图扭转这个可怕的命运，他命令我们收集一笔巨大的赎金。这些野蛮人做梦也没有想到的巨大数量的贵金属被集中了起来。\n当$MONARCH$被俘虏的时候，我们的国家和他一样成为了巨大的人质，也许是时候让另一个皇室成员哪怕是临时取代他的位置？

original: His heir will take his place.
translation: 他的继承人会接替他的位置。

original: One of his brothers will take his place.
translation: 他的一个兄弟会接替他的位置。

original: While visiting Tumbes $HEIR$ has been approached by a number of Merchants from the west. They claim that they come from the islands of Avachumbi and Ninachumbi, a distant land rich in gold. After consulting with the priests $HEIR$ is satisfied that the merchants are telling the truth and his imagination is now on fire.
translation: 在访问通贝斯时$HEIR$收到一群来自西方的商人的求见。他们声称他们来自阿瓦车姆比岛和尼娜车姆比岛这富有黄金的遥远的土地。在咨询了祭司之后，$HEIR$很满意地知道这些商人在说实话，现在他的想象力正在燃烧。

original: Mount an expedition into the Pacific to find these islands.
translation: 向太平洋派遣一支远征队来寻找这些岛屿。

original: Our §YHeir§! will go on a long voyage and may not return.
translation: 我们的§Y继承人§!将会开始一段常常的航行并可能无法归还。

original: Let us focus on the here and now and not on distant dreams.
translation: 让我们着重于当前当地而不是遥远的梦想。

original: Together with a force of 20 000 men $HEIR$ left the shores of our kingdom searching for the lands of Avachumbi and Ninachumbi. Having successfully completed his mission $HEIR$ now returns with tales of these islands and the people living there. During his voyage he has learned many things about seafaring and leadership as well as the distant islands themselves.
translation: $HEIR$带领着20000人离开了我们王国的海岸出发寻找阿瓦车姆比岛和尼娜车姆比岛。在成功完成了任务后，$HEIR$现在带着这些岛屿和上面居民的传说回来了。在他的远征中，他学会了许多关于航海和领导力，以及这些遥远的岛屿本身的事情。

original: Let us use what we have learnt to improve the seafaring skills of our people.
translation: 让我们用学到的知识增强我们人民的航海能力。

original: It is now many months since $HEIR$ left our lands to search the seas for far away islands. The seas can be treacherous and the most likely explanation is that something has gone wrong and our heir is dead. It is time we move on.
translation: 自从$HEIR$离开我们的土地去海上寻找这些遥远的岛屿已经过去许多个月了。大海非常的险恶，对于他数月不归的最有可能的解释就是事情有些不对而我们的继承人已经死了。是时候开始下一步了。

original: It seems there has been another outbreak of European diseases in our lands. Even the strongest now fear the new diseases and oracles are foretelling the end of our society.
translation: 我们土地上似乎爆发了另一起欧洲瘟疫。即使是最强壮的人现在也在害怕这种新的疾病，神谕也在述说着我们社会的终结。

original: Is there nothing we can do?
translation: 难道我们什么都做不了么？

original: In the recently conquered lands near the coast of Lima we have come across a huge temple complex where one of the Andean oracles resides. The idol itself is not much to look at, a simple wooden figure rather than the usual golden gods we have come across elsewhere, but the shrine seems to be of great significance to the people here.
translation: 在利马海岸新征服的地区，我们发现一系列巨大的神庙，安第斯神谕的其中之一就在那里。神像本身似乎并不耀眼，只不过是一个简单的木质雕塑而不是我们在别处看到的黄金神像，然而这个祭坛似乎对当地人来说非常重要。

original: This is a fascinating religion, let us embrace it instead.
translation: 这是一个迷人的宗教，让我们接纳她。

original: Allow the locals to continue but tax the pilgrims.
translation: 允许当地人继续不过像朝圣者收税。
向大神庙建设做出贡献

original: This province is contributing resources to the construction of new stages on the Pyramid of the Great Temple in Tenochtitlan. Apart from greatly speeding up the construction as such this has also allowed us to tighten our grip over the area considerably.
translation: 这个省份正在向特诺奇蒂特兰的大神庙的金字塔的下一层的建设提供资源。除了将大大加速建设之外，这还允许我们显著提升对这个区域的掌控。

original: This is the site of the Great Temple of Tenochtitlan, a magnificent pyramid temple that is never quite finished as every ruler is obliged to add more stages to it.
translation: 这里是特诺奇蒂特兰大神庙，一个巨大的金字塔神庙。她从都不曾被完成，因为每个统治者都有义务去增加更多的阶梯。

original: A collection of sumptuary laws protect the states of our nobility while at the same time encouraging commoners to fight well in our wars as that is the only way to rise above one's birth.
translation: 一系列奢侈法保护着我们贵族的地位，与此同时鼓励着普通人在战争中尽力战斗，因为这是一个人可以拥有超越其出身的唯一方法。

original: Every foul weather from frostbite to drought is plaguing our country this year with profound effects on our society.
translation: 从严寒到干旱，每一种恶劣的气候今年都在我们国家肆虐并给我们的社会带来了深远的影响。

original: Our state is steadily improving after some very harsh times.
translation: 我们的国家正从非常艰难的时期稳定地恢复。

original: While Tenochtitlan has in many ways risen to become the strongest of the city states that control the Aztec Empire Texcoco, with its rich traditions in areas of law, craftsmanship and trade has lately been given more space to shape our state. As usual the many minor states under our rule have not been shy about using this sharing of power to increase their own autonomy.
translation: 当特诺奇蒂特兰在很多方面都成为了阿兹特克帝国最强大的城邦时，特斯科科以其在法律，手工艺和贸易方面的丰富传统在后来给我们国家提供了更大的可塑空间。和通常一样，许多我们治下的小国都使用这种影响去增强他们的自治度。
内萨瓦尔科约特尔的法律

original: One set of laws are in use throughout our realm and specific laws regulate the judges themselves so as to prevent abuse.
translation: 我们开始推行一系列法律，还有些法律专门约束法官，保证法条不被滥用。

original: A horrible epidemic unlike anything we have ever seen is plaguing our country. Symptoms include dysentery, abdominal pains, intense bleeding and high fever.
translation: 我国开始流行一种从未见过的传染病。症状包括腹泻，腹痛，大出血和高烧。
特诺奇蒂特兰大金字塔

original: It has now been some years since our ancestors shook off the yoke of the Tepanecs of Azcapotzalco and instead joined together in the Aztec triple alliance of Tenochtitlan, Texcoco, and Tlacopan. Since then the power of our people has grown significantly and by now our state controls the entire valley of Mexico. The city states under our rule still remember that we were all equals not so long ago and it is uncertain how far we can trust their loyalties.\nAs it is every ruler's task to build a new stage of the Great Pyramid of Tenochtitlan we have an excellent opportunity to try the loyalty of our subjects. Any subject city that contributes to the project will be too preoccupied to revolt and any that refuses will have shown its worth and can be punished.
translation: 自我们祖先摆脱阿斯卡波察尔科的特帕内克人的统治已经过去好些年了。阿兹特克人的国家由三个部落组成，分别是特诺奇蒂特兰，特斯科科和特拉科潘，彻底控制着墨西哥谷地。那些被统治的城市或许还记得我们曾经同他们一样下贱。所以他们的忠诚绝对是一个问题。\n因为每一任领导人都需要改建特诺奇蒂特兰大金字塔，我们可以借机测试附庸的忠诚度。那些认真参与到工程中的城邦会因为沉重的负担而无法发动叛乱。那些拒绝的城邦则一定会得到惩罚。

original: All our subjects must contribute to the Pyramid!
translation: 所有的附庸都参与了工程!

original: Our provinces will pay for part of the cost of the Pyramid.
translation: 我们省将出钱承担一部分的工程.

original: Let us use our own resources for this project.
translation: 我们将捐出资源来支援工程.

original: Much as we suspected not all of the cities under our control have welcomed the chance to put all of their resources at our disposal, and it seems clear that we will have to carry a larger part of the costs than we had hoped.
translation: 正如我们预料的，不是所有的城邦真心支持金字塔工程。或许我们负担的部分得增加点了。

original: The great contributions we have received have resulted in an impressive addition to the Pyramid.
translation: 我们得到了巨大的帮助，金字塔的进度大大加快。

original: The contributions from our provinces have paid for part of the new Pyramid.
translation: 我们已经支付了金字塔工程相应的部分。

original: The Pyramid is effectively paid for by only the central government and other city states in its immediate surroundings.
translation: 只有中央政府和首都附近的城邦承担了金字塔工程。

original: Tlacaelel, the foremost architect of the Aztec Triple Alliance and the first person to be named its Cihuacoatl, prime minister, is an indispensable force within our state. Having served a number of Tlatoanis, Tlacaelel is by now involved in the running of almost every part of our state. He is the one who organizes our military campaigns, he handles our finances and when our Tlatoani is in the field he acts in his stead.\nAbove all, however, Tlacaelel is a great champion for the worship of Huitzilopochtli and has taken a number of measures to ensure that our deity and the martial traditions that surround him is given the proper respect.
translation: 特拉凯利尔，阿兹特克三部落同盟的总设计师，第一位获得太阳之蛇称号的人，皇帝的首相，是国内无可替代的人物。历任数朝后，特拉凯利尔的权柄涉及帝国的每个角落。他组织了军队，他整顿了经济，甚至在皇帝不在时拥有摄政之权。\n最重要的是，特拉凯利尔是太阳神崇拜的拥护者，他采取了各种手段保证我们的神性与战斗力。这使他十分令人尊敬。
限奢法令 & 战士文化

original: Every male in our society is expected to take up arms in times of war and the success of our state has always depended on our brave warriors. In order to further encourage the warrior culture of our people the Cihuacoatl is now working on a set of laws restricting everything from how our subjects dress, what they may buy in the markets and what ornaments they can use or what offices may be held in government.\nWhile these laws will protect the rights of our nobility they are above all a way to reward valorous warriors. For the commoners their skill in battle will be what determines how they dress and what they may own. Even among the nobles positions in government will only be open to those who fight without fear.
translation: 我们的男人在战时都是强大的战士，他们也是我们能延续至今的原因。为了延续这种战士文化，太阳之蛇大人决定颁布一系列法律规定生活中的一切风俗习惯，比如衣着，商品，首饰甚至政府的办公室。\n虽然这个法律惠及贵族，但是它的初衷是褒奖勇敢的战士。对于普通人来说，他们的生活水平取决于他们的战斗能力。甚至只有无畏的勇士才可以担任政府中某些职务。

original: We do not need such laws, tradition will remain our guideline.
translation: 我们不需要这样的法律，顺其自然就好。

original: The Famine Year of the One Rabbit

Time is a cycle and what has been will always come again. The year of the one rabbit is upon us and so are the snows, the frost and later on the droughts associated with it.\nThe weather will not be kind to us this year and a great famine is tearing up our society. As desperate men sell their children into slavery to feed their remaining families some demand that our $MONARCHTITLE$ should release them of servitude to him and allow them to seek new lives elsewhere.
translation: 时间就像一个圆一样不断循环。今年是兔一年，所以开年就下暴雪和冰霜，之后则是无尽的干旱。\n今年注定不会风调雨顺，一场大饥荒考验着我们。一些人开始卖儿卖女只为换得一些口粮。所以，有人认为$MONARCHTITLE$应该解放人民，让他们自由寻找适合居住的地方。

original: As we leave the disastrous year of One Rabbit behind us we enter a new cycle and the signs tell us this cycle is one that will see the rise of our people to greatness. A great happiness fills the hearts of our people as we perform the traditional New Fire Ceremony, they know the harsh times are behind them and that the coming years is going to be the beginning of the Aztec era.
translation: 天灾不断的兔一年终于过去了，接下来是新循环的开始。在这个循环中，阿兹特克能够变得更加强大。在新火典礼之后，每个人心中都充满了希望。因为他们知道困难的时光已经过去，未来属于阿兹特克。

original: For thus it is ended; thus sickness and famine have left us
translation: 终于结束了; 饥饿与疾病离开了我们

original: The Power Balance of the Triple Alliance
translation: 三部落同盟的权力平衡

original: While the Aztec Empire can be seen as a unified state in many ways it is still technically an alliance of the three cities of Tenochtitlan, Texcoco and Tlacopan. When the alliance was created the first two could be said to have been of equal strength with Tenochtitlan being the center of a stronger military culture while Texcoco was the center of law, engineering and the arts. These roles have only become more pronounced as our empire has grown. Tenochtitlan, as the dominant city in all military matters has therefore come to rise to a position above the others and many of our subservient chiefs now send their tribute directly to Tenochtitlan.
translation: 尽管阿兹特克帝国是一个整体，但是实际是三个部落的联盟，分别是特诺奇蒂特兰，特斯科科和特拉科潘。建国之初，前二者的实力更强大些，特诺奇蒂特兰军事占优，特斯科科则长于政治和文化。随着帝国的成长，这种定位更加固化。特诺奇蒂特兰凭借军事实力成功压制了其他部落。现在很多小部落的酋长直接将上缴的税赋送进特诺奇蒂特兰。

original: Continue to centralize power in Tenochtitlan.
translation: 继续向特诺奇蒂特兰集中权力.

original: Attempt to empower Texcoco to a greater degree.
translation: 试着提高特斯科科的权力.
尼扎华克尧特的法制改革

original: Traditionally legal matters in Mesoamerican states are left to the respective judges of the subject cities. As the Aztec state has grown, however, this has led to considerable differences within its borders. Nezahualcoyotl, the leader of Texcoco, has therefore created a new collection of laws with strict rules and specified punishments for every crime. The plan is for these new laws to be implemented all over the Aztec domain resulting in a more unified Aztec legal system.\nTo be sure that the local judges actually do make use of these new laws a number of them also deal with the punishment of judges that don't perform their duties in accordance with the laws.
translation: 一般来说，中美洲各个城邦的法律事务由各个城市自己决定。随着阿兹特克帝国的崛起，一系列严酷法律竞相出台，规范了罪犯的刑罚。现在，我们计划将这些法律推广到阿兹特克全境，统一阿兹特克法律系统。\n为了保证所有的地方法官能够贯彻新法，一些法官甚至被要求审判那些被查处的不按新法操作的法官。

original: Let us implement these laws immediately!
Why meddle with that which has worked for generations?
translation: 为什么要在这个事情上瞎折腾？这种事情急不得。

original: Many of the city states absorbed into the Aztec Empire retain a high degree of autonomy and in many places the former local rulers still hold considerable power. One such city state has recently refused to provide the tribute we are due and the customary headdress of warning that was sent to its leader does not seem to have had much effect. A single city is hardly a considerable threat but should others see us as weak they might well follow into open rebellion.
translation: 虽然许多城邦都并入了阿兹特克帝国，但是其中不少还保持着相当规模的自治权，前领主们依旧掌握着可观的权力。有一个城邦拒绝上缴税赋，而且它的领主对我们的警告置若罔闻。一个城邦或许是小事，但是其他人会因此小瞧我们，从而加入叛军。

original: Attempt to conspire with the elders of the city to stop this.
translation: 暗中联络城邦中的大佬劝阻那个领主。

original: Prepare a military expedition to depose the leader of the city.
translation: 派遣军队废黜那个领主。

original: The emissary we sent to the elders of the city has managed to convince them to take care of the problem of the obstinate chief.
translation: 密使联络了城中大佬，他们成功地处理了顽固的领主。

original: Our actions to avert rebellion have so far had little effect. The slowness of our reaction has resulted in more cities joining and an open revolt is now afoot.
translation: 我们的密使徒劳无功。而我们台面上的行动迟缓反而促使更多城邦加入叛军。
阿兹特克商人感到厌烦

original: The Tenochtitlan Pochteca Guild is complaining that the Totonacs to our north have been harassing their members. The Totonac claim that the traders are nothing but Aztec spies. Apart from the general slight against our country these long distance merchants are the only source of some of the luxury items that our society uses to distinguish between the social classes.
translation: 特诺奇蒂特兰商会向我们抱怨，北方的托托纳克一直在骚扰商队。托托纳克声称我们的商人都是间谍。虽然这些商人有些反感我们的统治，但是他们向我们提供了很多奢侈品。我们用这些奢侈品来奖励臣民。

original: Since the arrival of the Europeans strange diseases and deadly are spreading rapidly among our people. As more and more people lay sick with fever and blisters our society is shaking at its core.
translation: 自从欧洲人来了之后，奇怪的瘟疫在人群中蔓延。越来越多的人发烧且浑身起泡，这极大地动摇了我们的社会稳定。

original: A new strange fever has begun to spread in our lands. It is far worse than any disease we have ever seen either before or after the arrival of the Europeans. The fever and the bleeding that comes along with it leads to death in just 3 - 4 days and its rapid spread among our people has led to widespread panic in our society.
translation: 奇怪的疾病在我们的土地上蔓延。伴随着欧洲人来的它比从前任何的疾病都要危险。发烧和出血会在3-4天内夺走一个生命。疾病的迅速蔓延在社会中制造着恐慌。

original: Since the arrival of the Europeans strange diseases and deadly are spreading rapidly among our people. As more and more people lay sick with fever and blisters our society is shaking at its core.
translation: 自从欧洲人来了之后，奇怪的瘟疫在人群中蔓延。越来越多的人发烧且浑身起泡，这极大地动摇了我们的社会稳定。

original: The arrival of the hostile European forces in our lands has not gone unnoticed among the more dissatisfied elements among our subjects. While many remain hesitant about what to make of these newcomers others have shown little hesitation and have already pledged to aid the Europeans to overthrow our rule.
translation: 欧洲人的到来刺激了我国内的不安定因素。虽然大部分人在观望，但是已经有人引狼入室试图推翻我们的统治。

original: A number of dissatisfied subjects of the Aztec Empire have taken this opportunity to defy Tenochtitlan and will help us fight the Aztecs while protecting their own freedom.
translation: 一些不满的城邦试图抓住机会推翻特诺奇蒂特兰的统治而且只要我们能保证他们的自由就帮助我们对抗阿兹特克帝国。

original: We have conquered the city of Cholula, an ancient Temple city dedicated to the worship of Quetzalcoatl and a major Mesoamerican pilgrim site. Throughout the city there are hundreds of temples to the pagan gods and a steady stream of natives travel here every year.
translation: 我们占领了乔卢拉，一座古老的宗教之城，它供奉着羽蛇神克查尔科瓦特尔。城中满是寺庙，城外则是前来朝圣的人群。

original: This is a fascinating religion, let us embrace it.
translation: 这是个迷人的地方，让我们保护它。

original: Let them continue to worship their gods here.

The Dominican priest Francisco Ximenez transcribed and translated the Popol Vuh, a corpus of mytho-historical narratives of the Post Classic K'iche' kingdom which contains the creation story of the K'iche', epic tales and regnal genealogies.
translation: 著名牧师弗朗西斯科希梅内斯翻译了波波武经，一部叙述前基切王国的故事集。它描述了基切王国的诞生，王国的大事和国王的系谱。

original: Popol Vuh - Book of the People

As our country has converted to the $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ religion, there are those who fear we will forget about our older traditions and myths. In order to please those who still haven't accepted $COUNTRY_RELIGION$, a learned scholar has suggested that we translate and transcribe the creation myth, the epic tales of the hero twins Hunahpu and Xbalanque and other, perhaps relevant, myths of old.
translation: 因为我国现在已经改宗 $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ ，有人担心我们会遗忘过去。为了安抚这些人，一位学者建议翻译那本传奇著作，这记录了乌纳普和斯巴兰克这对兄弟的神话故事，还有其他相关的神话传说。

original: No, it is a waste of time.

The confederation of several Maya states crumbled and fell during the 15th century, fragmenting the Yucatán region into several petty states. The largest ones were the Itza, the Xiu, the Cocomes and the K'iche'. This former alliance was formed after the fall of Chichen Itzá and might not have been entirely voluntary. Mercenaries were hired to enforce the alliance and the nobles of the tribes were forced to live inside the walls of Mayapan to make sure their kingdoms remained loyal. The league began to disintegrate in 1175 but it was not until the middle of the 15th century when a war between the Uxmal and Cocom created segregation and uprisings which lead to its complete collapse.
translation: 在15世纪，由几个玛雅部落组成的联盟奔溃了。尤卡坦半岛上现在充斥着小部落。最大的几个是伊察，修，科科梅斯和基切。前同盟的消亡同奇琴伊察的陷落并不是天命使然。这个联盟曾经依靠雇佣兵强迫几个部落的长老们住在玛雅潘，以保证他们的忠诚。但是在1175年，联盟就开始分裂，到了15世纪中叶，乌斯马尔和科科姆的战争彻底撕裂了联盟，导致了它最终的解散。

original: It was a mistake to let it crumble...
Aj Kan Ek' and the Prophecy

When the Spanish conquistador Hernán Cortes visited us, he left behind a lame horse that sadly died despite us treating it as a deity and feeding it poultry, meat and flowers. Hernán Cortes often spoke of the greatness of his religion and what it had brought his country.
translation: 西班牙探险家埃尔南·科尔特斯前来访问我们的时候留下了一匹瘸马。尽管我们像对神一样对待它，以家禽、肉和鲜花喂养它，它还是死了。埃尔南·科尔特斯曾经常提起他的信仰之伟大和给他的国家带来的一切。

original: We are satisfied with our religion.
translation: 我们很满意自己的信仰。
$COUNTRY$ 得到了这次改信的消息.

original: The Aj Kan Ek', ruler of a small country in South America, said that according to ancient Itza prophecy it is not yet time for them to convert to Christianity. But thankfully, they have finally accepted the $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ faith. This was mostly due to the diligence of our missionaries in our colonies overseas.
translation: 伊察之王，南美一个小国家的统治者，表示，根据古老的伊察预言书，现在还不是他们改信基督教的时候。不过谢天谢地，他们终于接受了 $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ 信仰。这都多亏了我们海外殖民地中传教士的勤勉。

original: The horse that Hernán Cortes gave to us and which we made into a statue did not please our guests Juan de Orbita and Bartolome de Fuensalida. Orbita destroyed our statue and it was only the eloquence of Fuensalida that saved their lives. Our priests were hostile and jealous of the missionaries even before they destroyed our statue, and told them that according to an ancient Itza prophecy it is not yet time for us to convert to Christianity.
translation: 埃尔南·科尔特斯给我们并被我们做成雕像的马让胡安·德·奥尔维塔和巴托洛梅·德·范萨里达很不高兴。奥尔维塔毁掉了雕像，多亏了范萨里达的口才才保住了小命。在修士们摧毁雕像之前我们的牧师就很敌视和嫉妒他们。牧师们告诉他们根据伊察预言书，现在还不是我们改信基督教的时候。

original: The priests are wrong, we should seize this opportunity!
translation: 牧师们是错误的，我们必须抓住机会！

original: It is not yet time for us to convert to another religion.
translation: 现在还不是我们改信另一个宗教的时候

original: A Franciscan friar by the name of Diego Delgado and eighty Christianized Maya has reached our capital. Delgado had joined a Captain Francisco de Mirones who was on his way to assault us but the friar thought the captain excessively cruel and therefore left the army. The captain and his soldiers have already been dealt with; they were slaughtered by our own. We have seized Diego Delgado and his followers and are awaiting your orders. Should we sacrifice them to the Maya gods, or let them go?
translation: 一个名为迪亚哥·德尔加多的方济会修士和八个玛雅基督徒到达了我们的首都。迪亚哥来的路上曾加入法兰西斯科·德·米隆尼斯上校率领的前来袭击我们的部队。然而修士无法忍受上校的残忍而离开了他的队伍。上校和他的士兵们已经被我们宰杀干净。现在被我们抓住的修士和他的追随者正听后您的发配。我们是应该将他们献祭给玛雅诸神，还是放他们离开？

original: Let them go and embrace Christianity!
translation: 放他们走，并且皈依基督教！

original: Sacrifice them as an example to all!
translation: 将他们献祭来杀鸡儆猴！
$COUNTRY$ 得知了这次献祭的消息.

original: The Franciscan friar Diego Delgado and eighty Christianized Maya have been sacrificed by $FROM_COUNTRY$. They mock us and our God with their shameful rites!
translation: 方济会修士迪亚哥·德尔加多和八个玛雅基督徒被$FROM_COUNTRY$献祭。他们以他们可耻的仪式来羞辱我们和我们的主！

original: The king, warrior and hero Tariácuari declared himself lord in 1335, and made Pátzcuaro his capital. The neighboring Ihuatzio and Tzintzuntzan were ruled by his two nephews and they started building their cities. Tzintzuntzan is now a place of political dominance and the city's population has grown large. The city is protected from attacks by the Yauarato hill which also permits a view of most of Lake Pátzcuaro and its shores. 'The Place of Hummingbirds', as Tzintzuntzan translates to, is the perfect place from where to control our political, economic and religious life.
translation: 勇士，英雄和国王特瑞库阿瑞，于1335年称王并定都帕兹卡洛。邻接的伊沃兹欧和辛祖坦则由他的两个侄子统治并分别建立起城市。辛祖坦现在已经在政治上建立起了霸主地位并且有着庞大的人口。这座城市旁边的亚拉托山不仅保护着城市免受攻击，并且俯瞰帕兹卡洛湖及其沿岸。“蜂鸟之地”，正如“辛祖坦”一词本意，是管理我们政治、经济和宗教事务的完美之地。
改善我们的首都辛祖坦.

original: 'The Place of Hummingbirds', as the name translates to from P'urhepecha, was the ceremonial center of the Tarascan state capital. The five yácata pyramids in the city line up and looks out over Lake Pátzcuaro and the city itself is located on the side of the Yauarato hill which protects it from attack.
translation: “普雷佩查”，本意“蜂鸟之地”，是塔拉斯卡人首都的仪式中心。城市中的五座亚卡塔金字塔一字排开朝向帕茨夸罗湖。城市坐落于亚瓦拉托山侧而得以免受外来威胁。

original: Princess Erendira has just returned after leading a war on the Spanish. Her hatred of the Spanish conquerors began even before some Spanish warriors found and murdered her father in his sleep. When the Spaniards came to Tarascan, Princess Erendira stole a horse after killing its owner, a Spanish horseman. She then taught others how to use horses. Her presence here will greatly increase morale, or you can recruit her as a general.
translation: 埃伦蒂菈公主刚刚率部从与西班牙的战争中返回。她对西班牙征服者们的憎恨甚至始于西班牙人谋杀了她处于睡梦中的父亲之前。当西班牙人来到塔拉斯卡时，埃伦蒂菈杀掉了一名西班牙骑兵以偷走他的马。她教会了其他人如何骑马。她的存在将极大鼓舞军队的士气，或者你也可以将她作为将军招募。
请她作为将军率领军队.

original: Use her to increase the morale of our soldiers.
translation: 利用她鼓舞军队的士气.

original: The legend of Princess Erendira tells a tale of a woman who led a war on the Spanish since the day they arrived. She taught others to use horses after stealing a horse from a Spanish horseman and her father was murdered in his sleep by Spanish warriors. No one knows what happened to her, but there are many tales of how she escaped the Spaniards. One claims that her own people kidnapped her for her own safety, putting her in a temple so that the Spaniards would not find her and kill her.
translation: 艾伦蒂菈公主的传奇讲述了一位女性自西班牙人到来之日起就领导与他们的战争的故事。她从西班牙人那里偷来了马匹并教会了其他人骑马。她的父亲则在睡梦中被西班牙人谋杀。没有人知道她最后去了哪儿，但是流传着许多她如何从西班牙人手中逃脱的传说。其中一则声称她的属下为了她自身的安全软禁了她，将她安置在一所寺庙中来保证西班牙人永远无法找到并杀害她。

original: We have recently discovered that Inca Hualpa is not who he claims to be! His real name is Pedro Bohorquez, an Andalusian adventurer. The Paziocas have accepted him as a military leader, and losing him might lower the morale of our soldiers. Although Bohorquez has lied to use, he has the support of the Jesuits and his army has maintained control for a long time. What should we do?
translation: 我们最近发现“印加的胡尔帕”并非他所自称的那个人！他的真正名字是佩德罗·博赫魁茨，一个安达卢西亚冒险家。帕兹欧卡斯已经接受他作为军事领袖。驱逐他可能降低士兵们的士气。尽管博赫魁茨欺骗了我们，他依然得到了耶稣会的支持并且他已经控制了军队很长一段时间。我们应该怎么办？

original: Ignore it and appoint him as general.
translation: 忽略他的欺诈并任命他为将领。

original: The enemy's forces are growing, and we need to choose a 'toqui', a wartime chief, to lead our troops. Caupolicán is an extraordinarily strong man, but he has little experience with the enemy. Lautaro has served as an auxiliary to the enemy's cavalry and he knows much about fighting the conquistadors but he is not as strong as Caupolicán. No matter who the council chooses, you have the final say. Who shall be our toqui?
translation: 敌人的力量在增长，我们需要选择一位“突魁”，一位战争首领，来领导我们的部队。考波利坎是个极其强壮的人，但是他对敌人所知甚少。劳塔罗曾在敌人骑兵部队中作为辅兵服役，对这些西班牙探险家的作战方式所知甚详，尽管他并没有考波利坎那么强壮。无论议会选择谁，你有着最终决定权。谁将是我们的“突魁”？

original: Lautaro with his insight in fighting the enemy.

The battle between us and troops of the Inca Empire occurred between the Maule River and the Itata River. Their borders are though far from us and there is a chance that we will escape Inca rule. We have for the first time met people with a clear state organization and it has opened our eyes. The battles between us and the Inca have given us an awareness of the difference between them and us, what distinguishes us and the invaders. We have realized that it is time to unite and form something that will protect us from the Incas and other invaders.
translation: 我们和印加帝国的战斗发生在马乌莱河与伊塔塔河之间。我们离他们的边境很远因而依然有机会逃脱被印加统治的命运。我们第一次见到了有组织国家的人群，这让我们大开眼界。我们和印加之间的战斗让我们深刻意识到了我们与入侵者之间的差别。我们意识到是到了该联合起来并组成一个能从印加人和其他入侵者手中保护我们自己的组织的时候了
以神的名义创建我们的国家...

original: Fear and interest will unite men.
translation: 用恐惧和利益将人们统合在一起.

original: Our people have been forced into slavery by Bandeirantes - followers of the banner - in various ways. Survivors have told us about bandeirantes disguising themselves as Jesuits, singing mass to lure them out or using surprise attacks to capture them. Settlements have been set alight and sometimes the bandeirantes leave more dead behind than alive they have captured. The people were treated as animals, put into a large outdoor pen until there were enough of them to take to the coast and sell as slaves. This is a lucrative business for the Bandeirantes, who also use our people in expeditions to find precious metal and stones. Maybe there is a way we could take part of their earnings and make sure they do not decimate our population?
translation: 我们的人民被班代兰蒂斯-先锋旗兵以各种方式逼迫成为奴隶。幸存者告诉我们这些人将自己伪装成耶稣会士，咏唱弥撒来迷惑他们，或者通过突袭捕获他们。定居点被付之一炬，有时相比起捕获人数，旗兵杀死更多的人。他们像动物一样对待抓捕的人民，把他们关在露天的栅栏中，等到人数足够就运到海岸把他们卖作奴隶。对于旗兵来说这是笔利润丰厚的生意，他们还将我们的人民用于发现珍稀矿产和宝石的探险中。或许我们可以参与他们的生意并且让这门生意不会过于影响我们的人口增长。

original: We will approach them to make a deal.
translation: 我们会接触他们来达成协议。

original: This is despicable, we will fight it!
translation: 我从未见过如此厚颜无耻之人，我们要和他们作战!

original: $COUNTRY$ contemplates a deal with the Bandeirantes and Guarani.
translation: $COUNTRY$ 关注旗兵和瓜拉尼之间的协议.

original: A messenger from $FROMCOUNTRY$ tells us that their ruler is prepared to make a deal with the Bandeirantes who capture and force the people of $FROMCOUNTRY$ into slavery. Their methods are questionable, the Bandeirantes have been known to disguise themselves as Jesuits, singing mass to lure the natives out or using surprise attacks to capture them. It is a very profitable operation though, and $FROMCOUNTRY$'s ruler suggests a way to make it easier to profit from this.
translation: 来自$FROMCOUNTRY$的信使告诉我们他们的统治者准备和旗兵达成一项协议，这些旗兵抓捕了$FROMCOUNTRY$的人民，把他们变卖为奴隶。他们的手段非常卑劣，旗兵们会把自己伪装成耶稣会士，咏唱弥撒来迷惑他们，或者通过突袭捕获他们。不过这是个非常赚钱的生意，$FROMCOUNTRY$的统治者希望能找到从中更好获利的方法。

original: We have received a reply from $FROMCOUNTRY$ and they are prepared to order their Bandeirantes to co-operate with us. The freedom of our people versus a rather large new way of income is at stake.
translation: 我们已经收到了$FROMCOUNTRY$的回复，他们准备命令他们的旗兵和我们合作。我们人民的自由和一大笔收入来说不值一提。

original: We have reconsidered - fight the Bandeirantes!
translation: 我改变主意了——和旗兵作战!

original: Bandeirates were slavers, fortune hunters and adventurers who enslaved natives in South America to either sell or bring as a work force on expeditions to find precious metals and stones.
translation: 班代兰蒂斯由奴隶贩子，追求财富者和冒险家组成，他们在南美洲抓捕土著奴隶，把他们卖掉或者当作探索新矿的奴隶

original: We have known about the plant Yerba Mate for a long time, and drink the beverage mate made from it every day. We have survived periods of drought and famine by drinking it and we call it the 'Drink of the Gods'. Our legend says that the Goddesses of the Moon and the Cloud visited Earth one day when they were attacked by a Yaguarete - a jaguar. The Godesses were saved by an old man, who told them that he had stayed behind when his tribe moved on to protect his young daughter and wife. He invited them to his hut and the next day when the Goddesses left, they discussed what they would give the old man and his family as compensation. They decided on a new kind of plant which they sowed and grew while the family slept. When the family woke up the Goddess of the Moon told them who she was and that they were given this plant as a gift for their goodness. The plant was to be the symbol of friendship and she taught them how to toast the yerba and to drink the mate. This is how the 'Drink of Friendship' came to be.
translation: 我们得知巴拉圭冬青这种植物已经有段时间了，并且每天喝用它做成的饮料。我们通过饮用它在多次干旱和饥荒中活了下来，因此我们称它为‘众神的饮品’。我们的传说告诉我们月亮和云女神有一天造访大地，但是被一只Yaguarete - 美洲豹所袭击。女神们被一个老人救了下来，他告诉她们他留在后方，而他的部落到前线去保护他的女儿和妻子。他邀请她们来到他的小屋，第二天女神离开时，她们讨论应该给老人和他的家族什么礼物作为报酬。最终决定给他们一种全新的植物，女神们在老人入睡的时候种下了这种植物。等老人全家醒来之后，女神们告知了他们的身份，并告诉他们这种植物就是对他们好心的报答。这种植物过去是友谊的象征，女神教他们如何料理这种植物并如何饮用。这就是‘友谊茶’的来源。

original: The Yerba Mate and its legend shall never be forgotten under my rulership!
translation: 在我们的统治下马黛茶和它的传说永远不会被遗忘！

original: The Yerba Mate is the plant from where the leafs for the beverage mate come from. It is called the 'Drink of the Gods' or 'Drink of Friendship' and has saved many lives during periods of drought and famine.
translation: 巴拉圭冬青的叶子可以做成马黛茶。这种饮料被称为‘众神的饮品’或者‘友谊茶’，它在饥荒年代拯救了很多人的性命。

original: The demand and export of yerba mate has increased the production of it. Yerba mate called the 'Drink of the Gods' or 'Drink of Friendship' and has saved many lives during periods of drought and famine.
translation: 对马黛茶出口的需求增加了巴拉圭冬青的种植量。这种饮料被称为‘众神的饮品’或者‘友谊茶’，它在饥荒年代拯救了很多人的性命。

original: Nheçu, one of our leaders, have commanded the slaughter of three Jesuits missionaries by the names of Roque Gonzales, João de Castilho and Afonso Rodrigues. They have been trying to convert people of his tribe and others to Catholicism!
translation: 我们中的一位将领，讷苏，指挥了一场针对三名耶稣会传教士的屠杀，他们的名字是罗科·冈萨雷斯，若昂·德·卡斯蒂略和阿方索·罗德里格斯，他们打算把他和其他部落的人民转化为天主教徒。

original: Stop him and release the Jesuits!

The people in one of our core provinces are being forced to relocate! A treaty between the European country and another forces the Guaranis inhabiting the Jesuit missions in the province to be evacuated. The people are protesting and many rebels have taken refuge in our country, still eager to fight back and reclaim the province for us. One of these, Sepé Tiaraju, is an excellent general and has offered his services to us.
translation: 我们一个核心省份的人民被迫迁徙！两个欧洲国家之间的一份协议迫使该省分耶稣会传教士所在区域内的瓜拉尼人被放逐。人们在抗议，许多叛军要求在我国得到庇护，并且渴望打回他们的故乡，为我们重新获得该省分的宣称。其中一位，Sepe Tiaraju，是一位出色的将军，他宣誓效忠于我们。

original: The farmers in one of our provinces have complained about the troubles Karai Pyhare - The Man of the Night - has made lately. Cattle has been set loose, eggs, chicken and honey stolen, horses frightened and corn scattered, all because of a short, ugly and hairy man known from the legends and myths of our people. He is blamed for the hairy and ugly children born and he is impossible to detect due to his hairy feet silencing his movements and his ability to turn invisible. The only way to stop him is by giving him gifts, honey and liquor usually work to appease him, and if it is done often enough he will become friendly and guard over one's home, animals, and possessions. Karai Pyhare will sometimes even leave gifts in return!
translation: 某个省份的农民向我们抱怨Karai Pyhare - 黑夜人最近制造了许多麻烦。家畜被释放，鸡蛋，鸡和蜂蜜被偷走，马受到惊吓，玉米被撒得到处都是，这一切都是因为一种矮个丑陋多毛的怪人，来源于我们人民口耳相传的神秘传说。他从一出生就因为多毛和丑陋被蔑视，他无法被发现，由于他多毛的双足使他的行动非常安静，他甚至能隐身。唯一的方法是给他礼物，蜂蜜或者酒水来取悦他，如果能好好这样做他会变得友好，甚至替人守门。Karai Pyhare有时甚至会留下礼物静静离开！

original: Leave out some honey and liquor for him.

Even the Incas marvel at the works of our great artisans and craftsmen. We are known for our silversmiths, weavers, ceramicists and others who produce treasures far beyond any other known culture. We should take pride in this and recognize the tremendous prestige our artisans bring to our country.
translation: 即使是印加人也会对我们工匠和手艺人的作品啧啧称奇。我们的银器匠，编织者，制陶工和其它工匠的名气远近闻名。我们应当对此感到骄傲，并感激工匠们的贡献大大提升了我们国家的声望。

original: The artisans of Chimu were silversmiths, weavers, ceramicists and others who produced treasures that even the Inca marveled at.
translation: 奇穆的工匠们，包括银器匠，编织者，制陶工和其它工匠能够制作出能让印加人都能惊讶的珍宝。

original: Our society is a four-level hierarchical system, with a powerful elite who rules over different administrative centers. This has helped us greatly in the past, as the organization of labor to construct canals and irrigated fields is an example of. Lower-order centers manage land, water, and labor, while the higher-order centers either move the resources to our capital or carry out other administrative decisions. There have been clamors about changing this system, especially from our artisans. They have been complaining about being forbidden to change their profession and being grouped in our city according to their area of specialization.
translation: 我们的社会分成了四个等级的阶级社会体系，有一个强大的精英阶层统治着不同的行政中心。这种制度过去为我们带来了很多便利，包括组织劳动力建设运河以及灌溉农田等等。低阶层的中心管理农田，水利和劳力，高阶层的中心可以将资源转运到首都，或者将其他管理决议下发出来。最近有一些声音要求改变这个体系，尤其是我们的工匠阶层。他们抱怨说他们被禁止改变他们的职业，并被禁足在城市的专门区域。

original: This is something we'll think about.

translation: 我们不会改变任何事情.

original: We have been asked to join a meeting to discuss the protection of the borders between us and a neighboring country in Salsipuedes. Hostilities between us and this country have led to an unstable truce, and this meeting might help remedy this.
translation: 我们被邀请参加一项在Salsipuedes举办的会议，讨论如何保护我们和一个邻国之间的边界。我们和这个国家之间的敌意导致了一项不稳定的和平协议，这项会议也许可以缓和局势。

original: We do not trust them and will not join the meeting.
translation: 我们不信任他们，所以不参加会议.

original: Hopefully this will lead to a stronger peace between us.
translation: 希望这次能给我们带来更加稳固的和平.
萨尔西普埃德斯大屠杀

original: The meeting was an ambush! It began with the chiefs of our nation being pampered and plied with alcohol and then 1200 men attacked. The men were slaughtered, the women and children enslaved. $MONARCH$ was one of few who managed to escape. Four of our people, Senacua Senaque, a medicine man, Vaimaca-Piru Sira, a warrior, and a young couple, Laureano Tacuave Martinez and Maria Micaëla Guyunusa were captured and rumor has it that they have been sent to Paris, to be exhibited to the public.
translation: 所谓的会议是一次埋伏！我们国家的长官被灌醉了，然后1200个战士突然发动了袭击。男人被屠杀，女人和小孩被俘虏。$MONARCH$是为数不多成功逃跑的人。我们人民中的四个，Senacua Senaque，一位医师， Vaimaca-Piru Sira，一位战士，以及一对年轻的夫妻，Laureano Tacuave Martinez 和 Maria Micaela Guyunusa被俘虏了，有传言说他们被送往巴黎，展览给公众。

original: We will never forgive, we will never forget!
translation: 我们不会原谅，我们不会遗忘!
萨尔西普埃德斯大屠杀

original: A navigator and explorer by the name of Juan Diaz de Solis and his crew of two officers and seven men have been captured. He claims that he has three ships waiting for him with a total of 70 men. We are waiting for your decision, my liege, what do you wish to do with him?
translation: 一个名叫索利斯的航海探险家和他的船员，两位官员和七个水手一起被抓住了。他声称他有三艘船以及七十个船员组成的舰队正在等着他。我们等待着你的决定，我的国王，你希望对他做什么？

original: The Aztecs are known for their terrible warfare, where they prefer to capture their enemy instead of killing them. It started when the Aztec Cihuacoatl, Tlacaelel, ordered the first Flower War. He ordered the capture of enemy soldiers to be sacrificed in order to please the gods who had struck the Aztecs with a great famine. It still continues, and even our country has felt the fear of meeting the Aztecs in battle and knowing that being captured by them will only end in one way - sacrificed to their bloodthirsty gods!
translation: 阿兹特克人以令人生厌的战争方式而闻名。他们喜欢活捉敌人而不是杀死他们。这从阿兹特克的皇家顾问特拉卡埃莱尔发起第一次荣冠战争时就开始了。他下令将所有俘虏献祭以取悦给阿兹特克降下饥荒之灾的众神。这种传统依然延续着，即使我们的国家也畏惧与阿兹特克作战。因为在战斗中被俘虏将只意味着一件事——被献祭给他们渴望鲜血的众神。

original: Grab their land, take their people, burn their fields!
translation: 抢夺他们的土地和人，烧毁他们的领地！

original: The powerful Tlaxcaltec warrior called Tlalhuicole was captured by the Aztecs! Only now has news of his fate reached us. The ruler of the Aztecs was struck by Tlalhuicole's bravery and character and ordered his release. Tlalhuicole refused the monarch's generosity, demanding that he would undergo the same fate as the other prisoners. The Aztec monarch offered him the command of an army about to be sent to drive back the Tarascan, which Tlalhuicole accepted in the hopes of a glorious death in the ensuing battle. He defeated the Tarascan army despite their desperate resistance and returned to the Aztecs with spoils of war and many captives. Although the Aztec monarch tried to persuade Tlalhuicole he would not accept the place as commander-in-chief or return to Tlaxcala, as the first would be treason and the second a stain on his glory. Tlalhuicole got his wish, to be tied to the stone of the gladiators and sacrificed to the gods through battle. Eight warriors attacked Tlalhuicole, one after another, but they were all defeated. The ninth warrior managed to stun him and Tlalhuicole was ritually executed.
translation: 名为特拉尔维科莱的特拉斯卡拉战士被阿兹特克抓住了！直到现在我们才得知关于他命运的消息。阿兹特克的统治者被特拉尔维科莱的勇敢所打动并下令释放了他。特拉尔维科莱拒绝了国王的好意并要求接受和其他俘虏一样的命运。阿兹特克国王提议让他带领一支即将出发前去击退塔拉斯卡人的军队。特拉尔维科莱接受了，以期能在接下来的战斗中获得荣耀的死亡。尽管塔拉斯卡军队在绝望中进行了激烈的抵抗，特拉尔维科莱还是击败了他们并带着战利品和俘虏返回了阿兹特克。尽管阿兹特克国王试图说服他，但特拉尔维科莱即不愿意接受军队统帅的位置，也不愿意返回特拉斯卡拉。因为前者将会是对祖国的背叛，而后者则将是对他荣耀的玷污。特拉尔维科莱最终得到了他想要的，他被绑在角斗士之石上以战斗的方式献祭给众神。八个战士一个接一个的攻击特拉尔维科莱，但都被他击败了。第九个战士成功地击晕了他，特拉尔维科莱被以献祭仪式的方式处决。

original: He will be remembered, in history and in legend.

The Incas has arrived and we will not submit to them, worship their gods, nor serve them as slaves. Copacatiraca was one of many who wanted us to start this war but he has changed his mind after we have had many defeats by the Incas. He wish to persuade the people to accept the Incas and Copacatiraca tells us that the Inca king is benevolent, the Inca's laws are good and their government gentle. If we were to submit and be conquered, he argues, we will not be seen as slaves but as brothers, and a peace with the Inca would be convenient.
translation: 印加人已经到来，我们不会崇拜他们的神，也不会被他们当作奴隶。寇帕克提瑞卡是许多想要让我们开战的人之一，但他已经改变了主意。他希望能说服人民接受的印加人，寇帕克提瑞卡告诉我们，印加国王才是王道，印加人的法律是好的，他们的政府温柔。如果我们接纳和被征服，他认为，我们不会被看作是奴隶，而是被看作兄弟，并且与印加享有和平。

original: No, we will not submit to the Inca!
translation: 不，我们不会屈服于印加人 ！
