original: The Titi'kaka island in Lake Titicaca is known through legend to be the place where the sun emerged after days of darkness. The people living on the island were very frightened by the darkness but finally they saw the Sun emerge from Titikala, the Sacred Rock, and realized that it was the dwelling of the sun. The sun hid under the crag during a great flood and Titi'kaka was the first land to appear when the flood waters began to recede. The sun emerged from Titikala once again to illuminate the sky.\nIt would be wise to build a temple here, to bring pilgrims here and perhaps earn a coin or two.
translation: 提提喀喀湖中的提提喀喀岛在传说中是黑暗时代的最后太阳出现的地方。住在岛上的人都害怕黑暗，但最后他们看到太阳从提提喀喀圣石的位置出现，并且意识到这是太阳的居所。大洪水期间太阳躲到了一块峭壁之后而提提喀喀岛是洪水开始退去时出现的第一块陆地。从提提喀喀升起的太阳再次照亮了天空。\n在这里建一座庙宇可能会是个明智的选择，并且说不定还能赚点小钱。

original: Convert it into a pilgrimage destination!
We shall not exploit something so sacred!
translation: 我们不会利用如此神圣的东西！

original: Tupac Amaru II and Micaela Bastidas Puyucahua
translation: 图帕克·阿马鲁二世和米凯拉·巴斯蒂达斯·普尤卡瓦。

original: Tupac Amaru II and his wife Micaela Bastidas Puyucahua led a small rebellion against one of our bitter rivals from Europe. They were nearly captured and fled to us, to plead with us to continue their fight against the intruders and to ask us to hire them as generals. They are both fiercely protective of our freedom, as they themselves have declared.\nTupac Amaru II - 'I have acted only against the mentioned abuses and to preserve the peace and well-being of Indians, mestizos, mambos, as well as native-born whites and blacks. I must now prepare for the consequences of these actions.'.\nMicaela Bastidas Puyucahua - 'For the liberty of my people, I have renounced everything. I will not see my children flourish...'.
translation: 图帕克·阿马鲁二世和他的妻子米凯拉·巴斯蒂达斯·普尤卡瓦发起了一场针对我们那些来自欧洲的老对头们的小规模起义。他们几乎被俘但还是设法逃到了我们这里，恳求我们让他们加入反对入侵者的战斗，并要求我们聘请他们当将军。他们声称自己将会是我们自由的凶猛的保护者。\n图帕克·阿马鲁二世——「为了维护印地安人、麦斯蒂索混血、曼波以及土生土长白人的和平与安康，我已经采取了只针对上述暴行的行动。现在我必须为这些行动的后果做好准备。」\n米凯拉·巴斯蒂达斯·普尤卡瓦——「为了我的人民的自由，我已经放弃了一切。我甚至再没有机会看到我的孩子们长大繁衍后代……」
聘请图帕克·阿马鲁二世。
聘请米凯拉·巴斯蒂达斯·普尤卡瓦。

original: Hire Tupac Amaru II and Micaela Bastidas Puyucahua.
translation: 聘请图帕克·阿马鲁二世和米凯拉·巴斯蒂达斯·普尤卡瓦。
制造麻烦的亚提里巫医

original: One of our provinces has caused us a bit of trouble. A Yatiri has spoken up against us, for reasons unknown, and this is particularly troublesome as this is not a common behavior of a Yatiri. The person was struck by lightning when they were out herding the flocks and has since then undertaken the journey to find their ch'amakani, the senior yatiri who trained them to become a Yatiri. It is strange to find that a person whose purpose is to help anyone who consult them rallying against $MONARCH$. Perhaps it was the person who consulted the Yatiri who managed to entice such strange ideas into their head? Or was it a ritual gone wrong? The riwutu, the human skull used by the Yatiri, might have been cursed! The materials used could have been the wrong ones, the saxra bullets made when lightning struck metal or stone false or could the coca be the culprit? No matter what, we cannot allow this to continue!
translation: 我们的一个省份给我们带来了点麻烦。出于不明的原因，一个亚提里巫医公开反对我们。这是个很奇特的问题因为亚提里通常不这么做。此人在外出放牧羊群时被雷电击中，自那时开始希望找到恰姆卡尼，那个将他们训练为亚提里的老亚提里。一个目的是帮助任何向自己寻求建议者的人召集人们反对$MONARCH$是件很奇怪的事儿。或许正是某个向他咨询过的人设法诱使他产生了这样的念头？或者某个仪式出了错？枘巫毒，亚提里所使用的人类头骨可能被诅咒了，仪式用错了材料，闪电的冲击让制作萨克拉斯豆的金属或石头出了问题，或者古柯叶才是罪魁祸首？无论如何，我们不能让这种情形继续下去！

original: Silence the Yatiri with any means necessary!
translation: 不择手段地让那个亚提里闭嘴！

original: The Muisca confederation has no one king or absolute central authority. Instead our state is made up of a number of small chiefdoms with most falling either under the Zipa of Bacatá or the Zaque of Hunza. While the confederation allows us to resolve disputes and deal with outside threats together, as long as both the Zipa and the Zaque approve, for most matters the Muiscan chiefs remain quite autonomous.\nAs the two most influential rulers in the confederation there is quite a bit of rivalry between the Zipas and Zaques sometimes even resulting in warfare, either by proxy or directly.
translation: 穆伊斯卡人联盟没有一个绝对的控制者或者是权力集合中心，相反我们的国家是由一些酋长部落组成的。我们的联盟要求我们共同解决自身或是外部的威胁，但是只要能够得到泽巴和札奎批准，酋长们依然能够自理自身部落的问题。\n作为联盟中最有影响力的统治者，泽巴和札奎之间的竞争有时会导致战争，无论是由联盟还是由其自身。

original: We control the Salt Mines of Zipaquira.
translation: 我们控制着帕基拉的盐矿。

original: Tensions have been greatly eased by the intervention of the Iraca. The Muisca confederation is more held together than it has been in a long time and is ready to face any outside enemies.
translation: 伊瑞卡的干预缓解了紧张局势。穆伊斯卡人的联合会已经在很久之前就开始准备着面对任何的敌人。

original: This province is the home of the Zipa, one of the two main leaders of the Muisca confederation. Our influence in this area is therefore more limited than we'd like.
translation: 这个省份是泽巴的首都。因此，我们在这里的影响非常有限。

original: This province is the home of the Zaque, one of the two main leaders of the Muisca confederation. Our influence in this area is therefore more limited than we'd like.
translation: 这个省份是扎奎的首都，扎奎是穆伊斯卡联邦的两个主要领导人之一。因此我们在该地区的影响比我们想象的更有限。

original: Bacatá will remain the capital of Muisca.
translation: 巴卡塔仍将是穆伊斯卡人的首都。

original: A recent source of conflict between the Zipa and the Zaque is the small region known as Zipaquira. As the name suggest it's currently under control by the Zipa, despite being in quite near the domain of the Zaque. As the salt production has increased lately the issue of who is to control the area has become quite infected.
translation: 最近的泽巴和札奎之间的冲突源自于一个锡帕基拉的小区域。这片区域相当靠近札奎的控制范围，但是目前泽巴正在控制这里。随着盐的生产增加，他们之间冲突已经激化。

original: Let the Zaque administer the area.

The Zipa has decided to test our new Zaque by invading one of the chiefdoms that fall under our jurisdiction. While the invaded area is a lot closer to the Zipa's lands this is a blatant act of aggression and unless we act he will have expanded his influence at our expense.
translation: 泽巴人决定入侵由我们控制之下的一个酋长统治的领地，以考验我们的新扎奎。虽然被入侵的区域离泽巴的领地更近，但这是公然的侵略行为，除非我们采取行动，否则它会以牺牲我们的利益为代价来扩大自己的影响力。

original: Allow the chiefdom to be annexed.

The Zaque has decided to test our new Zipa by invading one of the chiefdoms that fall under our jurisdiction. While the invaded area is a lot closer to the Zaque's lands this is a blatant act of aggression and unless we act he will have expanded his influence at our expense.
translation: 扎奎人决定入侵由我们控制之下的一个酋长统治的领地，以考验我们的新泽巴。虽然被入侵的区域离扎奎的领地更近，但这是公然的侵略行为，除非我们采取行动，否则它会以牺牲我们的利益为代价来扩大自己的影响力。

original: Allow the chiefdom to be annexed.

The high priests of the Sun Temple in Suamox make up the leadership of the Iraca chiefdom. While much less important than the Zaque or Zipa the leader of the Iraca is an influential man due to his position as keeper of the temple and spiritual successor of the mythical hero Idacanzas.\nTraditionally a supporter of the Zaque of Hunza the current ruler of the Iraca have now come forward to attempt to mediate and create peace between the feuding Zipa and Zaque to ensure the Muisca stand united against any foreign threats.
translation: 太阳庙索加莫索大祭司调解圣卢卡斯酋邦的领导。相比较泽巴和札奎，圣卢卡斯的领导者并不是太具有影响力的人，但是他在太阳庙里占有一席之地，同时也是神话英雄的精神传承者。\nHunza Zaque的当前统治者传统上的一名支持者，现在在Iraca纷纷出面试图调解，解决长期争斗的Zipa和Zaque，确保穆伊斯卡团结一致反对任何外国威胁。

original: The time has come to act together.
translation: 共同行动的时机已经到来。

original: There can be only one authority in the Muiscan lands!
translation: 只能有一个穆伊斯卡人土地！

original: With the growth of the Muiscan confederation under our leadership the old conflict between the Zaques and Zipas no longer seems relevant. The fact of the matter is that through the great leadership of $MONARCH$ and his ancestors [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] is now the undisputed center of authority in the Muiscan lands.
translation: 我们领导人旧冲突似乎影响到了穆伊斯卡人联合会的强大。事实上，经过$MONARCH$的领导者和他祖先[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的领导，那里已成为穆伊斯卡人无可争议的权利中心。

original: The minor Tupi tribes in this area, already alarmed by the actions of our Bandeirantes, have been inflamed by the news of the rise of the Tamoyo Confederation among the more powerful tribes. While they are detached from the confederation as such they present quite a nuisance locally.
translation: 塔穆约联合会在众多强大的部落中崛起，那些弱小的图皮部落感到激情澎湃。虽然他们是从邦联脱离的，但他们在当地颇有不受欢迎。

original: We have welcomed Caramuru, a shipwrecked European, into our tribe and he is maintaining contact with the colonies of his old homeland. This relationship benefits our trade both directly and our development in the long run.
translation: 我们欢迎了一个遭遇海难的欧洲人卡拉穆鲁，到我们的部落里。他保持着与他的旧家乡的殖民地的联系。这段关系直接且长远地有益于我们的贸易与发展。

original: Some of the European settlers in areas close to our border have begun to raid our settlements for slaves. Entire families of Tupi villagers are being tied up and marched off to sugar plantations in the European colonies. While at first we hoped this would be isolated incidents which we might demand retribution for it is now clear that these raids have been put in systematic use by some land holders. The elders of our tribe feel that if we don't act now this will be entirely out of control.
translation: 一些欧洲殖民者接近我们的边境地区袭击我们定居点并捕捉奴隶。图皮的村民整个家庭都被捆绑起来，送到欧洲殖民地的种植园。虽然我们希望和平解决，但是我们现在清楚袭击的人是那些土地的持有者们。我们部落的长老们都觉得，如果我们现在不采取行动，这一切将会完全失控。

original: Let us summon the Tupi tribes!
We must have faith in the foreigners policing themselves.
translation: 我们一定要相信外国人自己管理自己。

original: We have received messengers from $FROMCOUNTRY$ urging us to join them in a defensive agreement to protect our people against the European slavers that are troubling their lands. While we have ourselves not have as much of a problem with this the elders of our tribe feel that we must all band together in this time or be defeated one by one.
translation: 我们收到了来自$FROMCOUNTRY$使者的敦促，他们希望我们加入他们的防御性协定，以此来保护我们的人民免受欧洲奴隶贩子的困扰。虽然我们部落并不受到这个问题的影响，但是我们应该联合起来，或者是自顾自觉。

original: We have received word from the $FROMCOUNTRY$ tribe, they are welcoming this opportunity to join forces against the European slavers and will help us any chance they get.
translation: 我们已经收到$FROMCOUNTRY$部落的回复，他们希望借此机会联手打击欧洲奴隶贩子，并将无条件的帮助我们。

original: $FROMCOUNTRY$ declines to join the Tamoyo Confederation
We have received word from the $FROMCOUNTRY$ tribe, they are determined to face any outside threat on their own and won't join our confederation.
translation: 我们已经收到$FROMCOUNTRY$部落的回复，他们决心自己面对任何外部威胁，不加入我们的联盟。

original: It seems some of the plantation owners in our South American colonies have been paying adventurers to capture slaves in the nearby native villages. As a result one of the more powerful Tupi tribes have begun to gather a confederation of the greater and smaller Tupi tribes in an attempt to hinder our colonization of the lands they consider theirs.
translation: 似乎有些种植园主在我们的南美殖民地雇佣冒险家捕捉奴隶。其结果是更强大的图皮部族开始联合或大或小的图皮部落组成联盟试图阻碍我们，因为他们认为他们的土地被殖民化了。

original: We must meet them with force.

Two strange men arrived in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] today. They call themselves Jesuits and speak quite convincingly of the Christian god which our enemies worship. Though they speak our language and know our customs well, the Jesuits seem mostly interested in speaking to the leaders of the Tribe about ending the hostilities between the colonists and the Tupi.
translation: 两名陌生男子今天抵达 [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]。他们称自己是耶稣会士，和我们谈论我们敌人崇拜的耶稣。他们说我们的语言，了解我们的习俗，在言语中他们似乎特别想解决图皮与殖民者的冲突。

original: They are only trying to make us weak!
Due to the mediation of the Jesuits the Tupi have agreed to cease hostilities for the time being. The Tupi remain very doubtful of our true intentions, however, and the armistice seems very frail.
translation: 经过耶稣会士的调解，图皮已同意暂时停止敌对行动，然而图皮仍然怀疑我们的真实意图，看来停战协议非常的脆弱。

original: The Tupi tribes have begun banding together against the European settlers that are threatening them in South America. Fortunately, however, they are not considering us to be such Europeans. Perhaps we should make good use of this opportunity to weaken our colonial rivals and send help to the Tupi?
translation: 图皮部落已经开始针对正在威胁它们的南美洲的欧洲殖民者。幸运的我们不用考虑那些欧洲人。也许我们应该好好利用这一机会来削弱我们殖民地的竞争对手和给予图皮帮助呢？
我们不能支持这些野蛮人！

original: It seems our Christian enemies have enemies of their own. A group of Europeans arrived today eager to help us organize our efforts to marginalize the influence of the Bandeirantes.
translation: 看来基督徒的敌人也有他们的敌人。一群欧洲人热心地帮助我们，努力地减少班代兰特的影响。

original: One of our colonial rivals in South America has sent help to the Tupis hoping to help them destroy our colonies there. Clearly they have no business meddling in our affairs or indeed the continent of South America itself. In the colonies enterprising representatives of our state are coming up with ways to use this meddling as an excuse to seize colonies of $FROMCOUNTRY$ for ourselves.
translation: 在南美洲，我们殖民地的某个竞争对手的人向图皮求助，希望能帮助他们摧毁我们的殖民地。显然他们没有办法在南美洲干涉我们的事务。我们国家的殖民地激进者正在竭力以此为借口，为自己谋取$FROMCOUNTRY$的殖民地。

original: They have no right to be here!

translation: 塔普亚 - 图皮的竞争

original: In times past our ancestors of all the major Tupi tribes have waged war on the Tapuia who used to dominate the eastern coastline. This old rivalry is still quite alive in the minds of our warriors and now that we again have come across a Tapuia tribe they have already begun to prepare for war to once again dislodge them from lands that could be better used by our growing tribe.
translation: 在过去，图皮部落的祖先就对主宰东部海岸线的塔普亚发动了战争。这个老对手仍然活在的我们战士的记忆里，现在，我们又遇到了一个塔普亚部落，他们已经开始准备战争。再一次，把他们从土地上驱逐，我们的部落将更加强大。

original: There is no room for the Tapuia here.
translation: 这里没有塔普亚的空间。

original: Let us leave them alone this time.
translation: 这次让我们离他们远点。

original: Today a group of warriors found a lone shipwrecked European on our shores. This man is clearly a member of the people who have settled elsewhere on the coast of these lands. Among the members of our tribe he has already gotten the nickname 'Caramuru' after the eels which the warriors who found him lying on the shore thought he resembled.
translation: 今天一组战士在我们的海岸上发现了遭受海难的欧洲人。这个人显然是海岸以外的地方定居的成员。我们的部落成员给他取了绰号 '卡拉穆鲁' ，是因为发现他躺在岸上的人认为他的外形酷似鳗鱼。

original: Caramuru will start to integrate with our people and will eventually open up trade relations with the colonies of his mother country.
translation: 卡拉穆鲁将开始融入我们的社会，最终会他会带动他祖国殖民地的贸易。

original: We will send Caramuru away as soon as he is able to leave.
translation: 只要他能离开，我们会尽快送走。

original: Caramuru has shown himself to be a fast learner and has integrated well within our tribe. He now knows our language and has proven to be a useful member of our tribe, especially by helping us in our dealings with European settlers.\nLately tribal elders have approached $MONARCH$ suggesting that in order to tie Caramuru closer to our tribe we should allow him to marry our daughter Paraguaçu.
translation: 卡拉穆鲁已经表现出自己是一个快速学习者。他现在知道我们的语言，并已被证明是我们部落的一个有用的成员，特别是帮助我们与欧洲殖民者往来。\n最近，部落长老已经得到$MONARCH$暗示，为了配合卡拉穆鲁接近我们部落，我们应该让他娶你女儿帕拉瓜苏。
卡拉穆鲁和帕拉瓜苏联姻

original: Caramuru will be married to Paraguaçu, tying his destiny to ours, allowing us to benefit from his future projects.
translation: 卡拉穆鲁将嫁给了帕拉瓜苏，我们的命运将绑在一起，让我们从将来的同盟中受益。

original: This would be too great an honor.
translation: 这将是一个巨大的荣誉。

original: After having lived many years among our people, Caramuru and his wife have traveled back to the continent from which he once came. After having traveled the countries there they have returned, determined to further the development of the taming of these lands.
translation: 在我们的人民之间居住和很多年，卡拉穆鲁和他的妻子从他曾经到来的路线回到了大陆。从那些国家回来后，他们决心要促进这些土地的发展。
Cunhadismo现象(来自葡萄牙语cunhado(姐/妹夫))

original: Over the last years increasing numbers of Jesuits have begun to arrive in our lands. These priests are quick learners and already seem to have a good grasp of our language and customs. A growing number among our people have started to follow the religious ways of these priests and a small number of Portuguese colonists have also begun to settle in our villages. Some of these settlers have even intermarried with the Tupi Christian converts. We could make good use of this development to align ourselves with the Portuguese, if $MONARCH$ converts perhaps one of our daughters might even marry into one of the influential Portuguese families and cement an alliance between our peoples. The Portuguese could surely need our protection in these strange lands.
translation: 在过去年越来越多的耶稣会士已开始抵达我们的土地。这些人是快速的学习者，似乎已经掌握我们的语言和风俗习惯。越来越多市民开始跟随这些教士学习宗教，同时少量的葡萄牙殖民者也开始在我们的村庄定居，一些定居者甚至与图皮的基督教皈依者通婚。我们可以更好利用这一事态的发展使我们与葡萄牙人的关系变得和谐，如果$MONARCH$赞同我们的女儿之一嫁入一个有影响力的葡萄牙家庭来巩固我们两国人民之间的联盟。当然，葡萄牙肯定需要我们保护在这些奇怪的土地。

original: Stay with the gods of our Ancestors

After having lived many years among our people, Caramuru and his wife have traveled back to the continent from which he once came. After having traveled the countries there they set out to return to our tribe but this time it seems the oceans have claimed the life they where robbed off when he Caramuru arrived in our lands.
translation: 在我们的人民之间居住和很多年，卡拉穆鲁和他的妻子返回他曾经出发的地方。在即将抵达时，海洋夺取了他们的生命。

original: A sad day but his legacy lives on.
translation: 悲伤的一天，但他的遗产犹在。
奥里诺科河贸易的枢纽

original: Through an active policy the Caribs have come to dominate the Orinoco River trade and will continue to do so for as long as they hold this province.
translation: 通过积极的政策加勒比人主宰奥里诺科河的贸易，并会继续这样做，只要他们持有本省。

original: After having spent centuries on the Antilles the island Caribs are returning to our lands.
translation: 之后的几个世纪，在荷属安的列斯上岛，加勒比人正回归到我们的土地。

original: The trade along the Orinoco river has proven immensely valuable to our people and protecting our interests in this area will be vital to our future prosperity. There is some disagreement among the warriors and traders of our tribe on how to best control the river. The former would strike at any hostile tribe who tries to move into the area, while the traders feel it is much more important to convince any such foreign tribe to come to us and trade on our terms.
translation: 奥里诺科河沿岸贸易已被证明对我国人民非常重要，保护好我们的利益将是我们未来的繁荣至关重要的条件。有的战士与贸易者之间的分歧让我们不得不考虑如何最好地控制这条河上的贸易。前者希望打击任何试图移入该地区的敌对部落，然而贸易者觉得说服这种外国的部落遵守我们的条款重要得多。

original: The Orinoco belongs to the Caribs
translation: 奥里诺科河属于加勒比人

original: Focus our energy on creating a trade center here.
translation: 将我们的精力集中在这里，创造一个贸易中心。

original: Centuries ago many of our ancestors left the mainland in order to settle the islands of the Caribbean. As these islands have now increasingly come to be dominated by European powers our northern brethren have become more and more marginalized on their islands. Recently tensions have culminated in a bloody conflict between the plantation owners and the island Caribs and as a result there is now an increasing stream of Carib refugees seeking to settle in our lands. These Caribs have been away from the mainland for generations and have intermarried with the population of the islands and no longer speak the same language as we do.
translation: 几个世纪前我们的祖先为了占据加勒比群岛而离开。这些岛屿现在越来越多被欧洲列强主宰，我们北方的同胞已经在岛屿上变得边缘化。最近，这种紧张局势在种植园主和加勒比人之间的流血冲突中达到了高潮，因此越来越多的加勒比难民在我们的土地上寻求生计。这些加勒比人世世代代一直远离大陆，并与群岛的人口通婚，同我们不再讲同一种语言。
将他们纳入我们的社会。

original: They'll have to find their own place to live.
translation: 他们得找自己住的地方。

original: Arawak settle the mouth of the Orinoco
translation: 阿拉瓦克解决奥里诺科河的嘴

original: The mouth of the Orinoco river has been occupied by the Arawak. Carib traders report being attacked by the Arawaks who want to control the area for themselves.
translation: 奥里诺科河的嘴已经被阿拉瓦克占领。加勒比报告受到攻击，阿拉瓦克人想要为自己得到地区。

original: We have no interest in this area.
translation: 我们在这方面没有兴趣。

original: Due to the expansion of the Carib tribe in an area traditionally dominated by us our warriors have begun to make preparations for battle. If the Caribs should come for us we will be prepared.
translation: 由于加勒比部落地区传统上由我们控制，然而冲突已经开始我们的战士正在为战斗作准备。

original: Caribs settle the mouth of the Orinoco
translation: 加勒比人定居的奥里诺科河的嘴

original: The Carib tribe, traditionally an enemy of our people, have begun to expand eastwards and now holds the mouth of the Orinoco. For many of our people this is a frightening development. Some feel we should refuse to fear the Caribs and strike at them ourselves before they can harm us.
translation: 我们的敌人，加勒比部落已经开始向东扩张，如今持有奥里诺科河的嘴。对于我们许多人，这是一个可怕的发展。有些人认为我们应该拒绝恐惧加勒比人，以及在他们能伤害我们之前反抗。

original: Let us claim the Orinoco Delta!
translation: 让我们宣称奥里诺科三角洲 ！

original: We must prepare our defenses instead.
translation: 相反我们必须做好防御准备。

original: A number of European settlements have appeared in the Guyana. While they do not seem to be outright hostile to our people their weapons are terrifying and their motives are unclear to us.
translation: 在圭亚那，出现了很多欧洲殖民定居点。虽然他们似乎不是公然敌视我们，但是他们的武器很可怕，而且我们不清楚他们的动机。

original: We must mobilize our warriors against this new threat.
translation: 在这种新的威胁，我们必须动员我们的战士。

original: Attempt to convince them to protect us from the Caribs.
translation: 说服他们从加勒比来保护我们。

original: With the final battle now won, the War of the Roses - as it will come to be known - is at an end. We must now decide how to proceed, to strengthen our position at home and abroad. Even now there are whispers of potential usurpers, including the return from exile of the ambitious Henry Tudor. It might be prudent therefore to reconcile our two houses in matrimony.
translation: 赢得了最后一战的胜利之后，这场后世将称之为玫瑰战争的战争结束了。我们要决定下一步怎么做，巩固我们在国内外的地位。虽然有潜在篡位者的流言，包括野心勃勃的亨利·都铎从流放地回国了的流言。谨慎的做法是两家重归于好，互为婚姻。

original: There will never be reconciliation between our two dynasties!
translation: 两个家族永远不会和好！

original: It is time for peace, let us join our two houses together in marriage.
translation: 和平的时代到了，让我们联姻和好。
在意大利地区帝国权威正在衰退

original: While the Kingdom of Italy is still formally part of the Holy Roman Empire it has in many ways turned into a 'Shadow Kingdom', with the Italian states acting independently of the Emperor. The failure of successive Emperors to restore Imperial authority in the region has also left large areas under the control of states that outright reject Imperial Authority.\nBy now the question for many Italian states is why they should allow a German Emperor any authority over their lands.
translation: 虽然意大利王国在形式上还是神圣罗马帝国的一部分，但各种意义上已经成了一个“影子王国”，意大利诸国不听从皇帝的命令。历任皇帝在该区域恢复帝国权威上的失败，导致了大片土地处于公然拒斥帝国权威的邦国治下。\n现在许多意大利邦国的问题是，为什么他们要让一个德意志的皇帝在自己的土地上作威作福。

original: The Empire does not concern us.
Our country is a natural part of the Empire.
translation: 我国自古以来是帝国的一部分。

original: The Kingdom of Italy is still formally part of the Holy Roman Empire it has in many ways turned into a 'Shadow Kingdom' with the Italian states acting independently of the Emperor. The failure of successive Emperors to restore Imperial authority in the region has also left large areas under the control of states that outright reject Imperial Authority.\nBy now the Italian states are members of the Empire in name only.
translation: 意大利王国现在依然是神圣罗马帝国的一部分，但各种意义上已经成了一个“影子王国”，意大利诸国不听从皇帝调遣。历任皇帝在该区域恢复帝国权威上的失败，导致了大片土地处于公然拒斥帝国权威的邦国治下。\n现在，意大利诸国仅在名义上是帝国成员了。

original: The Kingdom of Italy and the Empire

For years now Imperial Authority over the Kingdom of Italy has been waning. Successive Emperors have failed to impose their will on the Italian states and large areas that are formally part of the Empire have been lost to Venice and the Papal States who reject the Empire's right to them.\nUnless Northern Italy is firmly brought back into the Empire the states there may slip out of Imperial control forever.
translation: 多年以来，帝国在意大利地区的权威一直在衰退。继任诸帝在意大利诸邦和大片之前属于帝国的地区推行权威的行动失败了，这片地区落入了抗拒帝国正当权利的威尼斯和教宗国之手。\n除非帝国光复北意大利邦国，不然这些邦国将永远脱离帝国。

original: Unless all of the region of §YThe Kingdom of Italy§! is part of the Empire before 1490 and stays inside it until 1550 the states there are likely to leave the Empire.
translation: 除非所有位于§Y意大利王国§!地区的邦国在1490年前成为帝国成员国且到1550年之前没有脱离帝国，否则这些邦国将会脱离帝国。

original:
Unless the following areas are entirely part of the Empire before 1490 and stay there until 1550 all Italian states will be given a choice to leave the Empire:
§YPiedmont§!
§YLombardy§!
§YEmilia-Romagna§!
§YLiguria§!
§YTuscany§!
§YCentral italy§!
§YVenetia§! (except Venice).
translation:
除非以下地区在1490年前是帝国的一部分，并在1550年之前一直在帝国内，否则所有意大利邦国都会得到脱离帝国的选择：
§Y皮埃蒙特§!
§Y伦巴第§!
§Y艾米利亚-罗马涅§!
§Y利古里亚§!
§Y托斯卡纳§!
§Y中意大利§!
§Y威尼西亚§!（除威尼斯外）。

original: The Holy Roman Empire has been torn apart by the formation of the new state of [From.GetName] which has been cut out of lands rightfully ours. Our inability to stop this development has shattered our authority over the lands that still remain in the Empire.
translation: 由于[From.GetName]的成立，窃走了本当属于我们的土地，神圣罗马帝国被分裂了。无能阻止其发生的我们，在仍留在帝国的领土上威信尽失。

original: There is nothing worse than ungrateful vassals.
translation: 没有比忘恩负义的附庸更糟的事了。

original: With the Byzantine Empire reduced to a distant memory most Greeks have come to lead their lives under foreign rulers. Some have left their old home region altogether as merchants or to serve in the various courts of Europe while most remain in Greece, leading lives in the countryside similar to before the fall of the Empire. Others even thrive under their new rulers. The independent Greek identity has, however, remained strong, and will in time make itself even more known among the unruly mountain Klephts or by the patriot dreams of intellectuals in foreign lands.\nWhile restoration of the Byzantine Empire remains an unattainable dream many have come to yearn to be free of the rule foreign tax collectors and hope for a new Greek state centered on the ancient homeland of their people.
translation: 随着拜占庭褪色成了遥远的记忆，多数希腊人生活在外国统治之下。有些人离开了故乡，成为了商人，或是在欧洲不同的宫廷中效力，但大部分人被留在希腊，在乡下过着和帝国灭亡之前几无二致的日子。有些人甚至在新统治者治下发达了。但独立的希腊认同却仍然坚挺，而且假以时日，将会在桀骜不驯的希腊“山贼”中，或是因他乡异国的知识分子的爱国梦而广为传播。\n虽然光复拜占庭帝国仍是一个遥不可及的梦想，但许多人都渴望从外国税吏的统治中获得解放，翘首企盼一个以他们的古老故土为中心的希腊国。

original: A shrewd diplomat and an able ruler, Haji Giray has spent the greater part of his life carving out a strong Khanate of his own away from the control of the Golden Horde. In order to survive Haji has never shunned making pacts with any state that could further his own goals. Surrounded by hungry states such as Poland, Lithuania, Genoa, and the Golden Horde, Crimea must steer a difficult path if it is to remain independent and thrive. Our Khan leaves a number of more or less qualified potential successors behind but as their common focus is to secure his throne the fate of the Khanate seems uncertain.\nTo the south a new power is watching developments with a keen interest, a fact that pretenders will be quick to exploit.
translation: 作为一个精明的外交家和能干的统治者，哈吉·格来花费大半生的时间开拓出了一个强大的汗国并使它远离了金帐汗国的控制。为了生存，哈吉从不回避与任何有利于实现自己目标的国家签订协议。克里米亚被波兰，立陶宛，热那亚和金帐汗国这些贪婪的邻居包围着，因此如果克里米亚想要保持独立和繁荣，就必须走出一条艰难的道路。汗王死后留下的诸多子嗣都或多或少算得上是合格的继承人候选，但是鉴于他们都对汗位充满了觊觎，汗国的命运可谓祸福难料。\n在南方，一股新近崛起的势力正热切地关注着事态发展，那些汗位的觊觎者们恐怕很快就会对这股势力加以利用。
我们必须寻求奥斯曼帝国的保护

original: The new §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§! will offer §YCrimean§! servitude as a March of the §YOttomans§!.\nThe §YOttomans§! will expect to be granted direct control over §YTheodoro§!, §YKaffa§!, §YMatrega§! and §YAzov§!.
translation: 新任§Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§!将把§Y克里米亚§!作为§Y奥斯曼§!的卫戍国。\n§Y奥斯曼§!将获得对§Y狄奥多罗§!、§Y卡法§!、§Y曼德拉§!和§Y亚速§!的直接控制权。

original: We will be better off without Ottoman involvement.
translation: 没有奥斯曼的介入，我们会过得更好。

original: §YCrimean Pretenders§! will seek the support of the §YOttomans§!.
translation: §Y克里米亚的篡权者§!将寻求§Y奥斯曼§!的支持。

original: With the death of Haji Giray the young Crimean Khanate must for the first time find its feet without it's dynamic founder. [From.Monarch.GetName] has managed to secure the Crimean throne but [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] position is very weak. Ambitious siblings have not given up on claiming Haji's legacy for themselves and to the east and west hungry neighbors are eyeing the Crimean lands greedily. In order to stabilize the situation [From.Monarch.GetName] has sent a plea for our help. [From.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] offers the servitude of [From.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] as well as direct ownership of a number of Black Sea ports if we are willing to protect Crimea from her enemies.
translation: 随着哈吉·格来的离世，年轻的克里米亚汗国必须学着适应在缺少那位精明强干的创立者时行事。[From.Monarch.GetName]已经获得了克里米亚的汗位，但是[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]地位并不稳固。那些雄心勃勃的兄弟姐妹们并没有放弃自己对哈吉遗产的宣称，而东西方的邻居也都在贪婪地觊觎着克里米亚的土地。为了稳定局势，[From.Monarch.GetName]已经向我们恳求帮助。[From.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]向我们承诺，如果我们愿意保护克里米亚不受侵犯，[From.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]愿意成为我们最忠诚的奴仆，而黑海沿岸的数个港口也将直接归于我们治下。

original: Let us help this new found friend!
translation: 我们帮助一下这位新结识的朋友吧！

original: Should we be able to subjugate Crimea we will install Mengli Giray as the new §Y[CRI.Monarch.GetTitle]§!. He will offer §YCrimean§! servitude as a March of the §YOttomans§!.\nThe §YOttomans§! can expect to be granted control over §YTheodoro§!, §YKaffa§!, §YMatrega§! and §YAzov§!.
translation: 如果我们能够收服克里米亚，我们将扶持明里·格来作为新的§Y[CRI.Monarch.GetTitle]§!，而§Y克里米亚§!则将成为§Y奥斯曼§!的卫戍国。\n§Y奥斯曼§!将获得§Y狄奥多罗§!、§Y卡法§!、§Y曼德拉§!和§Y亚速§!的控制权。

original: Let us not risk upsetting the balance of power in the area.
translation: 不要冒险破坏这个地区的力量平衡。

original: With the death of Haji Giray the young Crimean Khanate must for the first time find its feet without it's dynamic founder. [From.Monarch.GetName] has managed to secure the Crimean throne but [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] position is very weak. Ambitious siblings have not given up on claiming Haji's legacy for themselves and to the east and west hungry neighbors are eyeing the Crimean lands greedily. One of the failing pretenders to the throne, Mengli Giray, has fled to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] and he is now seeking our support. Mengli offers the servitude of [From.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] as well as direct ownership of a number of Black Sea ports if we are willing to help secure the Crimean throne.
translation: 随着哈吉·格来的离世，年轻的克里米亚汗国必须学着适应在缺少那位精明强干的创立者时行事。[From.Monarch.GetName]已经获得了克里米亚的汗位，但是[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]地位并不稳固。那些雄心勃勃的兄弟姐妹们并没有放弃自己对哈吉遗产的宣称，而东西方的邻居也都在贪婪地觊觎着克里米亚的土地。作为汗位的宣称者之一，夺位失败的明里·格来逃到了[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]并寻求我们的支持。如果我们帮助明里登上汗位，不仅[From.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]会成为我们最忠诚的奴仆，黑海沿岸的数个港口也将直接归于我们治下。

original: Let us help this new found friend!
translation: 我们帮助一下这位新结识的朋友吧！

original: Let us not risk upsetting the balance of power in the area.
translation: 不要冒险破坏这个地区的力量平衡。

original: The Ottomans have sent word that they will help us against any external or internal threat. While the Porte is content to see us act somewhat independently they expect us to pay them respect and to obey them when necessary.
translation: 奥斯曼已经作出承诺，他们将帮助我们对抗来自国内外的任何威胁。虽然奥斯曼朴特允许我们在一定程度上独立行事，但是他们希望我们对他们表示敬意，并且在必要时服从他们。

original: We have now tied our fate to theirs.
translation: 我们和他们现在已经命运相连。

original: The Ottomans have sent word that they refuse to help us against our enemies. This has reinvigorated support for our internal opposition and one more pretender has now taken up arms against us.
translation: 奥斯曼已经明确拒绝了帮助我们对付我们的敌人。这使得我们国内的反对势力信心大振，现在又有一伙篡权者起兵反对我们。
所以我们只能靠自己了。

original: Ottoman troops have successfully defeated ours and the [TUR.Monarch.GetTitle] now demands that the pretender Mengli Giray be enthroned as the new Khan of the Crimean Khanate.
translation: 奥斯曼的军队已经击败了我们，现在其[TUR.Monarch.GetTitle]要求任命篡权者明里·格来为新的克里米亚汗。

original: And so our fate is now tied to theirs.
translation: 所以现在我们和他们已经命运相连了。

original: Ottoman troops have successfully defeated Crimea and the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has made good on [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] promise to make the pretender Mengli Giray the new Khan of the Crimean Khanate. Through this subject we will be able to control the Steppes and unleash the Tartars on our enemies.
translation: 奥斯曼军队已经击败了克里米亚，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]也兑现了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]承诺，让篡权者明里·格来成为新的克里米亚汗。通过这种臣属关系，我们将控制整个大草原，并从敌人的手中解放鞑靼人。

original: And so their fate is now tied to ours.
translation: 所以现在我们和他们已经命运相连了。

original: Crimea is now a March of the Ottomans.
translation: 克里米亚现在是奥斯曼的卫戍国了。

original: Philippus Aureolus Theophrastus Bombastus von Hohenheim, who would later take on the name Paracelsus, was a Swiss physician and scientist credited with many important discoveries, primarily in the fields of medicine and chemistry. However, his most important legacy was his critique of the scholastic tradition of relying on ancient Greek philosophers as authorities on nature and medicine. He instead promoted observation and experimentation as sources of understanding. In addition, his lectures were given in German to make medical knowledge publicly available, something that further angered the academic establishment. Much of his life was spent traveling throughout Europe, both as an itinerant physician and as a Venetian army surgeon. In 1541 he came to settle in Salzburg where he died within a year.
translation: 菲利普斯·奥里欧勒斯·德奥弗拉斯特·博姆巴斯茨·冯·霍恩海姆——即后世所称的帕拉塞尔苏斯——是瑞士的一位医生和科学家，主要在医学和化学领域有很多重要的发现。 然而，他最重要的遗产却是对彼时“将古希腊哲学家视为自然科学和医学的权威”这一学术传统进行的批判。与之相对，他认为应该把观察和实验作为理解的来源。 此外，他的讲座使用的是德语，使医学知识能够为公众所知，这使得学术界更为震怒。 他一生的大部分时间都在环绕欧洲旅行，既是一名江湖医生也兼任着威尼斯的军医。 在1541年，他来到萨尔茨堡定居，之后在一年内去世。

original: Burn him along with his books
translation: 把他和他的书一起烧了

original:
Recently, the trial of Yi Sun-sin has garnered a lot of attention in the upper echelons of our military. Charged with desertion and negligence, Yi has been imprisoned for some time now; yet despite frequent torture he still refuses to admit his guilt.

What is more, the man seems to possess a natural understanding of military matters, and his service record shows a string of remarkable successes in repelling raids from across our borders. Yi's reputation of discipline and bravery is inconsistent with the charges brought before him, and so the whole trial reeks of a plot to frame the man.

There is talk of demoting him to the rank of common footsoldier, but surely the man's talents should not be wasted in such a lowly position.
translation:
最近，军中的高层对李舜臣一案很是关注。此前李舜臣因被控临阵脱逃、玩忽职守而入狱，至今已有一段时日，尽管经常遭受酷刑逼供，但是他始终拒绝认罪。

更重要的是，此人在军事方面称得上是天纵英才，他的履历可谓战功赫赫，屡次击退来犯之敌。李舜臣治军纪律严明、作战英勇的好名声与他所受到的指控抵牾之处甚多，故而整件案子都弥漫着阴谋陷害的味道。

有言论认为应该把他贬入行伍，但此人的才能绝不应该浪费在这么低的位置上。

original:
Recently, the trial of Yi Sun-sin has garnered a lot of attention in the upper echelons of our military. Charged with desertion and negligence, Yi has been imprisoned for some time now; yet despite frequent torture he still refuses to admit his guilt.

What is more, the man seems to possess a natural understanding of military matters, and his service record shows a string of remarkable successes in repelling raids from across our borders. Yi's reputation of discipline and bravery is inconsistent with the charges brought before him, and so the whole trial reeks of a plot to frame the man.

There is talk of demoting him to the rank of common footsoldier, but surely, considering our current war with Japan, the man's talents should not be wasted in such a lowly position.
translation:
最近，军中的高层对李舜臣一案很是关注。此前李舜臣因被控临阵脱逃、玩忽职守而入狱，至今已有一段时日，尽管经常遭受酷刑逼供，但是他始终拒绝认罪。

更重要的是，此人在军事方面称得上是天纵英才，他的履历可谓战功赫赫，屡次击退来犯之敌。李舜臣治军纪律严明、作战英勇的好名声与他所受到的指控抵牾之处甚多，故而整件案子都弥漫着阴谋陷害的味道。

有言论认为应该把他贬入行伍；但考虑到我们现在与日本之间的战事，此人的才能绝不应该浪费在这么低的位置上。

original: His skills would be squandered on the tactical level – make him an advisor.
translation: 他的能力若只用在战术层面上是种浪费——让他成为顾问。

original: A man with his brilliance must be reinstated as a leader at once.
translation: 一个如此才华横溢的人必须立即恢复将领之职。

original: We desperately need a man of his talents in charge of the navy.
translation: 我们迫切需要一个拥有这般才能的人统领海军。

original: It's better not to meddle with the justice system.
translation: 最好不要干涉司法系统。

original: With the fall of Kyoto [new_shogunate.GetName] has freed the Emperor and resumed the office of Shogun in his service. Long live the Empire of Japan!
translation: 随着京都的陷落， [new_shogunate.GetName]救出天皇并重建了幕府。日本帝国万岁！

original: With the fall of Kyoto the Emperor of Japan is no longer protected by the [From.GetName] Shogunate. The office has lost all relevance and the Daimyo of Japan will no longer pretend to honor the wishes of the old Shogun.
translation: 随着京都的陷落，日本天皇不再受幕府将军[From.GetName]的保护。 各层政府已经失去了所有的联系，大名们也不再需要虚意逢迎过去的将军了。

original: Disaster has been active for at least §Y5§! years.
Use the §YForce Janissaries To Undergo Yoklama§! Decision.
translation: 使用 §Y强制耶尼切里接受审查§!决议

original: With the Tosa province once again back under our direct rule we have been approached by some local Daimyo petitioning to take over the fiefs in the area on our behalf. The Chosokabe claim descent from the first emperor of China and have made themselves known as militarily strong retainers of their previous overlords. As retainers of the [Root.GetName] Shogunate they promise to be a loyal force for our interests in Shikoku.
translation: 随着土佐重新回到了我们的直接统治之下，一些当地的大名接近我们请求在我们的支持下接管领地。长宗我部宣称他继承了中国第一位皇帝的血统并且他以作为从前君主手下军力强大的家臣而知名。作为[Root.GetName]幕府将军的家臣，他们承诺成为我们在四国地区最忠诚的武力。
让我们授权给长宗我部。

original: We will keep it under our own control.
translation: 我们会让它一直留在我们自己的控制之下。

original: While lacking prior connections to the region, the Hojo clan has quickly arisen to prominence in the Musashi province. Having consolidated a number of territories they have built a strong castle in Odawara as their capital. This is quite impressive but also treason against our local retainers in the province.
translation: 虽然缺乏与该地区事先的联系，但北条氏迅速的突入了武藏国。在巩固了一批地区之后他们在小田原修建了一座坚固的城堡作为他们的都城。这相当的令人印象深刻但他们也同时背叛了我们在当地的家臣。

original: It is time for the Hojo to Shine.
translation: 这是北条氏闪耀的时刻了。

original: Let us strike down these traitors.

Descended from Oe Hiromoto, the Mori clan has quickly arisen as the leading clan of the Aki province. Through skilful maneuvering and military prowess Mori Motanari has defeated many local enemies and made a name for himself as an impressive general in his own right. At this point the Mori influence over the area has now grown past even our own and unless we act soon we will have to accept the fact that the Mori are now a faction in their own right.
translation: 毛利家，大江广元的后裔，迅速成为了安艺的统治家族。通过巧妙的机动和强大的军事实力毛利元就击败了当地许多敌人并让他的名字在所有人的脑海中留下了深刻印象。在这时候毛利家在这个地区的影响力已经超过了我们，如果我们不赶快采取行动就不得不接受毛利家已成为一股独立势力的事实。
安艺成为毛利家的省份。
我们不能忍受这种傲慢无礼的行为！!

original: While we are an old and honorable clan keeping together a domain as spread out as that of ours comes with problems. With the death of Shiba Yoshotoshi some retainers have chosen to support Yoshikado, a son adopted from a minor branch of the family at the request of the Shogunate over [Root.Monarch.GetName]. This places us in a precarious situation with [Root.Monarch.GetName] retaining control of part of the Shiba realm, while Yoshikado has the support of the nobles in [yoshikado_pretender_province.GetName].
translation: 虽然我们是一个古老而光荣的家族，但在一些领域上也分布了许多问题。随着东芝世书的死亡，一些家臣选择支持吉门，一个根据[Root.Monarch.GetName]幕府要求从分家中选出的子嗣。随着[Root.Monarch.GetName]控制了一部分东芝家的领土，虽然吉门也获得了贵族的支持，但这使我们处于一个不稳定的境地。

original: The long standing lack of a true-born son for [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has meant that for many years his brother, Mochitomi, has been considered the natural successor. With the appointment of [Root.Heir.GetName] as the new heir apparent, Mochitomi and his son Masanaga have proved unwilling to let go of their position and influence. Together they have formed a faction with ties all the way up to the court of the [shogunate_clan.GetName] Shogunate.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]长期以来缺乏一个亲生的儿子，这意味着他的兄弟持富多年来一直自然而然地被视为继承者。随着[Root.Heir.GetName]成为新的继承人，持富和他的儿子政长已经不愿意放弃自己的地位和影响力。他们一起组成了一个派系并联系上了[shogunate_clan.GetName]的幕府。

original: Having been unable to produce an heir of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] own, many of our stronger vassals are expecting [Root.Monarch.GetName] to adopt a member of one of the leading families of the realm as [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] successor.\nThe branches of the Hosokawa family seem unable to line up behind a single candidate however, and whichever heir we appoint we seem likely to face the displeasure his opponents.
translation: 由于无法产生[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]自己的继承人，我们许多强大的附庸期待[Root.Monarch.GetName]选择该地区的领导家族之一的成员[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]作为继任者。\n然而，细川家族的分支无法忍受排在那一位候选人之后，而我们任命的任何一位继承人似乎都可能面对对手的不满。

original: I will name Sumitomo as the heir apparent.
translation: 我将选择澄元作为继承人。

original: Sumiyuki of the Kujo would be best.
translation: 九条的澄之将是最好的继承者。
高国是一个合适的继承人。

original: The Miyoshi Family of Awa has been growing increasingly influential both by providing valuable services to our clan and by making use of the chaotic lawlessness that still exist in many parts of the country. Using the alliances they have forged with many of our retainers the Miyoshi family, under Nagayoshi’s leadership, is now attempting to make a bid to control our clan.
translation: 通过为我们家族提供有价值的服务和利用全国许多地区存在的混乱无序的情况阿波的三好家族的影响力日益增长。通过联盟的方式三好家族拉拢了很多我们的家臣，在长吉的领导下，他们正试图控制我们的家族。

original: It is time to make room for a man of ability.
translation: 是时候给有能力的人腾出空间了。

original: As our influence grows so has that of the minor branches of family. The Ogigayatsu branch of the Uesugi has been increasing their influence in Kanto, growing more and more independent-minded with each passing year. If we do not act soon we may find ourselves with very limited influence over the provinces held by our kinsmen.
translation: 与我们对分家影响力增长相对的，上杉家的分支扇骨家也在增加他们在关东地区的影响力，并且正变得越来越倾向于独立。如果我们不立刻采取行动，我们可能会发现自己无法再影响那些我们亲属所控制的省份。

original: We must keep the family together.
translation: 我们必须把家人放在一起。

original: In the aftermath of the assassination of Shogun Ashikaga Yoshinori in 1441 the Akamatsu clan was disgraced and stripped of their fief in Harima and handed over to the Yamana. Recently however the fief has once again returned to our hands and the Akamatsu have petitioned to be granted the right to return to Harima.
translation: 1441年在足利义则将军被暗杀之后，赤松氏族被剥夺了他们在播磨的封地，并交给了山名家。 然而最近领地又回到了我们的手中，赤松请求获得返回播磨的权力。
赤松家已经弥补了自己的错误。

original: We could never trust these traitors.
translation: 我们永远不会原谅这些叛徒。

original: It is not hard to see how this unusually dry year left the city of [1028.GetCapitalName] vulnerable to fires. Few would have guessed however that an unnoticed spark in a wooden temple would be the start of an all consuming fire. In three days the fire has reduced our once great city to cinders, claiming over 100 000 lives.\nIt now falls on us to rebuild and restore what once was a great city and perhaps to create a more fire-proof settlement for future generations.
translation: 不难看出这个异常干燥的一年是如何让[1028.GetCapitalName]城变得易于燃烧。几乎没有人会猜测到，一个木制寺庙中的一个未被注意的火花会是一场火灾的开始。 三天之内，这场大火把我们曾经的大城市变成了灰烬，据称有十多万人丧生。\n现在我们要重建和恢复这座曾经伟大的城市或许还要为后代创造一个更有效的防火措施。

original: We need large boulevards and dedicated fire brigades.
translation: 我们需要宽阔的林荫大道和专门的消防队。

original: We must focus on restoring the homes of our poor citizens.
translation: 我们必须把重点放在恢复我们贫民的家园上。

original: Fires and Quarrels are the Flowers of Edo.
We will restore the Castle first and spend as little as we can on restoring the rest of the city.
translation: 我们会先恢复天守阁，并尽可能少地恢复城市的其他部分。

original: A gigantic wave has our southern coastline, washing away houses and destroying castles, temples and roads. The effects of this disaster are felt along the entire Nankaido area and will likely have great effects on the region for years to come. All that remains for us now is to restore and rebuild what was lost.
translation: 我们南部的海岸线冲来一个巨大的波浪，它冲走房屋，摧毁城堡、庙宇和道路。 这次灾难的影响在整个南部地区都会感受到，并可能在未来几年对该地区产生巨大影响。 我们现在首先要做的一切就是恢复和重建失去的东西。

original: A gigantic wave has our southern coastline, washing away houses and destroying castles, temples and roads. The effects of this disaster are felt along the entire Nankaido area and will likely have great effects on the region for years to come. All that remains for us now is to restore and rebuild what was lost.
translation: 我们南部的海岸线冲来一个巨大的波浪，它冲走房屋，摧毁城堡、庙宇和道路。 这次灾难的影响在整个南部地区都会感受到，并可能在未来几年对该地区产生巨大影响。 我们现在首先要做的一切就是恢复和重建失去的东西。

original: For two weeks now cinders and ash have been raining from the skies around Mount Fuji. As the volcanic eruption finally draws to an end it remains for the local farmers and officials of the surrounding areas to recover fields and roads from the deadly ashes of our holy mountain.
translation: 从两周前的现在富士山周围的天空一直在下浮渣和灰烬。随着火山喷发的最终结束，周围地区残存的农民和官员开始从我们圣山致命的灰烬中修复田地和道路。
我们有朝一日会恢复的

original: For two weeks now cinders and ash have been raining from the skies around Mount Fuji. As the volcanic eruption finally draws to an end it remains for the local farmers and officials of the surrounding areas to recover fields and roads from the deadly ashes of our holy mountain.
translation: 从两周前的现在富士山周围的天空一直在下浮渣和灰烬。随着火山喷发的最终结束，周围地区残存的农民和官员开始从我们圣山致命的灰烬中修复田地和道路。
我们有朝一日会恢复的

original: After a period of widespread famine the peasants of the Shimabara peninsula have taken up arms against their local magistrate. Citing harsh taxation and oppression they have been joined by many wandering Ronin from the countryside, who are former servants of local families. It is also rumored that local Christian europeans are supporting the rebels who are now besieging the local castles.
translation: 在一段时期的大饥荒之后，岛原半岛的农民拿起武器对付当地的官员。 为了反抗严厉的税收和压迫许多流浪的浪人加入了他们，这些浪人来自农村曾经是当地家族的家臣。 还有传言说，当地的基督教欧洲人正在支持现在围攻当地城堡的反叛分子。

original: Some time back one of our retainers, Asano Naganori, was forced to commit Seppuku after attacking a rival, Kira Yoshinaka, within the walls of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]. Breaching the peace of our capital is a serious offense and few thought much more would come of it.\nYesterday, however, it seems forty seven sworn men, former Samurai of the dead Asano, now leaderless Ronin, breached Kira's mansion. Fighting their way through his defenders they finally avenged their fallen master, killing Kira and taking his head with them to Asanos grave.\nWhile a great feat there can be no doubt that these men have broken the laws of our [Root.GovernmentName] and that they deserve to be imprisoned and executed. And yet the people seem to admire and idolize these men.
translation: 一段时间前，浅野长矩在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的城内攻击了一个竞争者吉良义央后被迫切腹自杀。破坏我们首都的和平是一种严重的罪行，很少有人会想不到后果。\n然而就在昨天，有四十七名死士，是已死浅野的家臣，现在是无主的浪人，突入了吉良的宅邸。突破了护卫的防线杀死了吉良为他们死去的主君报了仇，并将吉良的脑袋带去了浅野的坟墓。\n虽然这是一个伟大的壮举，但毫无疑问，这些人已经违反了我们[Root.GovernmentName]的法律，他们应该被监禁和处决。然而，人们似乎对这些人很是钦佩和崇拜。

original: Let them take their own life honorably through Seppuku.
translation: 让他们光荣的切腹自杀吧。

original: Law and order must rule, let us execute these ronin.
translation: 法律和规定必须被遵守，让我们处死这些浪人。

original: Few have profited more than us from the fall of the Akamatsu clan after their assassination of Shogun Ashikaga Yoshinori. As the Akamatsu were stripped of their important lands and belongings many of them were given to reward our loyalty, and as a sign that we have atoned for the rebellion of 1391. This sudden rise to power has made some suspicious however. The Hosokawa especially view our influence as troubling and might well act to limit our influence in the future.
translation: 在将军足利义教被暗杀之后，没有其它家族比我们从赤松家的没落中获益更多。随着赤松家被剥夺了他们最重要的土地，其中多数被赏赐给我们的忠臣，这成为了他们为1391年叛乱赎罪的一个标志。然而力量的突然增强也会遭到他人的疑虑。 细川家尤其把我们的影响力看作是麻烦事，而且很可能会在未来限制我们的影响力。

original: Let us bide our time and build our power to challenge the Hosokawa in the future.
translation: 让我们等待时机并积蓄力量在未来挑战细川家。

original: Let us forge alliances and pacts to contain the Hosokawa influence.
translation: 让我们结成联盟和协约来遏制细川的影响。

original: In this time of war and unrest many fear for their safety in the Imperial court of Kyoto. Many influential nobles, retainers, scholars and artisans are now turning away from the great city, looking to the provinces for safety.\nFor a distant clan such as ours this is an opportunity in disguise. If we can attract these men of quality to our court in Yamaguchi we could aspire to be a new Kyoto in the west. For anyone to take such a claim seriously we would have to invest greatly in the growth of our city, its castle and its infrastructure. Renovations that would come at a high price…
translation: 在战争和动乱时期很多人担心在京都皇室的安危。许多有影响力的贵族、家臣、学者和工匠都离开了京都，并在各个省份寻找安全之处。\n对于像我们这样的遥远的家族来说，这是一个变相的机会。 如果我们能够把这些优质的人才吸引到山口，我们就可以成为西方的新京都。为了实现这样的想法，我们将不得不对我们的城市，城堡和基础设施的发展投入很大的力量。 翻新的价格将会很高昂……

original: A nice dream, but an expensive one.
Yamaguchi shall be like no city before it.
translation: 山口在此之前像没有城市一样。

original: Tired of the lawlessness that prevails in the Japanese lands in the current era the Merchant Council in the city of Sakai has taken matters in their own hands, creating a small autonomous community of their own. They have now approached the court of [Root.Monarch.GetName] asking for our protection and continued autonomy to pursue their own mercantile goals.
translation: 厌倦了当今日本国土上的无法无天，堺的商人自己动手，创建了一个属于自己的小型自治团体。他们现在已经联系了[Root.Monarch.GetName]的宫廷要求我们的保护和持续的自主权来从事他们自己的商业目标。

original: A dynamic son of our ruler, Harunobu, has surprisingly taken up arms against his father for the leadership of our clan. He has quickly gained the support of many of our retainers who recognize a brilliant leader in the man. Can this be the man who will lead the Takeda to greatness or is it just a disloyal son, acting out against his father?
translation: 我们统治者的一个有野心的儿子，晴信，出乎预料的起兵对抗他的父亲以夺取我们家族的家督之位。他迅速获得了许多把他视为杰出领导人的家臣的支持。他是一个领导武田壮大的伟人还是仅仅只是一个不忠的儿子呢？

original: We must look to Harunobu for leadership.
translation: 我们必须遵从晴信的领导。

original: For decades our clan has been the most powerful in Kanto and at odds with the Kamakura Kubo, a member of the Ashikaga Clan given the mission to control the Kanto region. Eager to gain power and influence for his own family the Kubo has also often been in conflict with his kinsmen in Kyoto, and as recently as 1439 the Shogunate deposed the last Kubo by force of arms.\nAs of [GetYear] a new Kubo has taken up office in Kamakura. The newcomer, Shigeuji, has wasted no time to act against our interests and recently killed our deputy Uesugi Noritada.\nThis is a grave affront to our clan and one that the Shogunate could never stand behind.
translation: 几十年来，我们家族已经成为了关东地区的最强势力，但也与镰仓公方，这位奉命控制关东地区的足利家族成员产生了不和。公方渴望为他自己的家庭获取权力和影响力但同时和在京都的其他家族成员产生了纷争，就在1439年也就是最近，幕府将军以武力罢免了公方的职务。\n[GetYear]之后，新的公方来到了镰仓。新上任的成氏没有浪费时间，直接采取了行动对抗我们，并且杀死了我们对副手上杉宪忠。\n这是对我们极大的侮辱，哪怕幕府做他的靠山也没用。

original: The days of the Kubo are numbered!
translation: 公方的日子就要到头了！

original: We must not disturb the peace.

Power is worth nothing if it is not visible. While we have secured control over the Shogunate we must still impress on the many servants of the Empire that all power lies with the [Root.GetName] Clan. Let us build a great castle close to the court as a constant reminder of what the source of our power is. It must be higher and stronger than any castle before it and be built to make good use of the modern arms that warfare has brought this country. The Azuchi castle will be a symbol of our power, and a tool to control central Japan for our family.
translation: 看不到的权力一文不值。虽然我们已经控制了幕府，但我们仍需继续向在帝国领土上的所有与[Root.GetName]家族相关的人施压。让我们在皇宫附近建起一座更伟大的城堡以此来不断提醒我们力量的源泉是什么。它必须比以往所有的城堡都更高也更坚固，同时也要充分的利用起战争给这个国家带来的现代化武器。安土城会成为我们力量的象征以及我们家族控制日本中心的一个工具。

original: We have no time for such vanities.
translation: 我们没有时间浪费在如此渺小的事情上。

original: The Oda clan is divided in factions and held back by old loyalties. A young scion of our family, Nobunaga, has emerged victorious from a series of succession disputes in Owari. Willing to forego principles for his greater ambitions Nobunaga seems like an unstoppable force both within our clan and in his dealings with other families.\nOnly time can tell where this can bring the Oda.
translation: 织田氏中有几个不同的派别，但他们都同样被昔日的忠诚所约束。我们家族年轻的子孙——信长在尾张一连串的继承纠纷中获得了胜利。信长愿意为了自己的野心而放弃原则，无论是我们织田氏内部还是在处理其它家族的问题的时候，他看起来都像是一股无法阻挡的力量。\n只有时间可以告诉我们这会给织田氏带来什么。

original: A remarkable man has risen from among our Ashigaru to earn the right to be sandal-bearer of our great Lord [Root.Monarch.GetName]. Though secretive of his past he seems to be of no lineage to speak of and come from humble origins.\nNonetheless Hideyoshi is one of our greatest generals and a power within our realm. In this era of self-made strong men he seems to embody the ideal warrior, loyal, clever and able.
translation: 一个非凡的男人从足轻中被提拔了出来并获得了为我们尊贵的[Root.Monarch.GetName]拎草鞋的职位。虽然他对自己的过去遮遮掩掩，但似乎出身卑微，没有血统可言。\n尽管如此秀吉仍是一位伟大的将军并且是我们国家中不可或缺的力量。在这个白手起家的时代，他似乎就是一个理想的战士，忠诚、聪明、能干。

original: We have great need of such generals.
translation: 我们非常需要这样的将领。

original: He would make a worthy successor.
translation: 他将成为一个有价值的接班人。

original: Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has always taken a great interest in the economy of his realm. Managing everything from sweeping overall policies to minor day to day thing in his personal domain he has no interest in perpetuating the inefficient, if traditional, customs and habits of our ancestors.\nRecently he has set out on a number of reforms to lessen the power of the trade guilds, prohibiting monopolies, increasing trade invovlement and protecting the roads under our control.
translation: 我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]总是对他的王国中的经济有着极大的兴趣。在他个人的王国里他管理着从全面的政策制定到日常的事物处理等所有事情。他毫不在意我们祖先的低效、传统的风俗习惯。\n最近他开始了一系列的改革以减少贸易行会权力，禁止垄断，增加贸易干涉力度并保护在我们控制下的道路。

original: Over time it has become evident to all that it is the economic and political prowess of [Root.Monarch.GetName] that has made our realm blossom. [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] reorganization of the kingdom administration, [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] hard work to attract foreign traders, and the creation of a new bureaucracy for our unified kingdom has allowed [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] to expand our capital and oversee the construction of temples, palaces and monuments.
translation: 随着时间的推移，[Root.Monarch.GetName]所掌握的经济和政治权力明显的使我们的王国繁荣起来。[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]改组了王国的行政系统，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]努力工作吸引了国外的商人，并且在我们王国中一个崭新的官僚机构的建立允许[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]扩建我们的首都并且能够监督寺院、宫殿和纪念碑的建造。

original: This is truly a golden era for our kingdom.
translation: 这真是我们国家的黄金时代

original: Eager to avenge the legendary betrayal of the crusaders Byzantine troops spared no-one as they descended upon the once-great city of Venice. The mission of the imperial generals has always been clear, all patrician families must be stripped of their property and honors, and the treasures that were once stolen from the city of the worlds desire must be returned.\n\nAs the time came for the descent of Byzantine armies upon the City of Water, things turned more hideous than anyone could have imagined. A lifetime of warfare does not foster kindness in anyone and with commanders eager to see the city burn, byzantine soldiers embarked on a several days long campaign of devastation and plunder of churches, palaces and even the Venetian arsenal.
translation: 在对十字军的惊世背叛的复仇渴望驱使下，拜占庭军队涌入威尼斯这座昔日伟大的城市后，没有留下一个活口。帝国众将军的使命始终明确：必须剥夺所有显贵家族的财产和荣誉，誓要夺还所有世界渴望之城被窃取的珍宝。\n\n拜占庭军队攻入水城之时，场面令人惊骇到超乎人类的想象。任何人都不会经历一生戎马却长出菩萨心肠，加上指挥官渴望见证此城隳灭，于是拜占庭士兵在教堂，宫殿甚至威尼斯人兵工厂展开了持续数天的破坏和掠夺。
让他们憎恨，只要他们恐惧。

original:
Revolution! The autocratic government has fallen and the Tsar justly beheaded at Peter’s Square. It is time to create a new Russia, a Revolutionary Russia!

The new regime takes its leaders from the formerly secret ranks of the Union of Salvation, a cabal of Imperial Army officers who took a stand against oppression and led the uprising against the Tsar. Pavel Pestel was the ideological heart of the Union, while Mikhael Lunin and Nikita Muraynov led the charge from the front lines. Sergei Trubetskoy, nominally the leader of the Union, has only recently returned to Russia following ill-health. Each places a bid for leadership of the new Russian state.

The revolutionary state aims to abolish serfdom, establish equality under the law, and redistribute the land of oppressive nobles between the State and the peasantry. With a strong foundation in political liberalism, the revolution carries an unwavering resolve to challenge autocracy throughout the world.
translation:
革命！专制政府已经垮台，沙皇也在公正地审判后于彼得广场被斩首。是时候缔造一个新的俄罗斯，一个革命的俄罗斯！

新政权的领导人们来自于前秘密组织「救国协会」，这一秘密组织由帝国军官构成，反对压迫并领导了反抗沙皇的起义。帕维尔·彼斯捷尔是联盟的思想核心，而米哈伊尔·卢宁和尼基塔·穆拉维约夫则在前线领导起义。协会名义上的领袖谢尔盖·特鲁别茨柯伊由于健康状况不佳，最近才回到俄罗斯。各地都在争取俄罗斯新政府的领导权。

革命政府致力于废除农奴制，从法律层面上建立平等，在国家和农民之间重新分配压迫人民的贵族们的土地。革命以政治自由主义作为其坚实基础，它决心坚定不移地挑战全世界的独裁制度。

original: The Union of Salvation will lead the revolution!

Our soldiers parade into the newly christened city of Tsargrad, formerly Constantinople, in celebration of the heroic victories that have led to this moment. With this new conquest, [Root.GetName] will be seen in the eyes of the world as the true Third Rome!\n\nAll that remains is to decide on the capital of our renewed nation; shall it remain in the great city of [Root.Capital.GetName], or shall we relocate the court to Tsargrad?
translation: 我们的士兵游行进入新命名的沙皇格勒城——曾经的君士坦丁堡——以庆祝这史诗般的胜利。[Root.GetName]将在世界眼中被视为真正的第三罗马！\n\n接下来就是决定我们新成立的国家的首都：是留在当前的首都[Root.Capital.GetName]还是刚占领的沙皇格勒？
沙皇格勒将成为我们的首都！

original: [Root.Capital.GetName] shall be made even more glorious!

Kiev was once the capital of the first great empire of the Rus. Over the years it has been sacked by impertinent Princes, burned to the ground by the Mongols, and subjected to the rule of Lithuania.\n\nNow the city has fallen under our control, and we have the means to restore the once-magnificent city to its former glory. If we choose this path, we would be embracing the legacy of Kievan Rus and adopting a distinctly Ruthenian cultural identity; a great empire will be reborn.
translation: 基辅曾经是罗斯第一个大帝国的首都。多年来，它被粗鲁的王公们劫掠，被蒙古烧毁，并受到立陶宛的统治。\n\n现在这座城市已经在我们的控制之下，我们有办法让曾经辉煌的城市恢复昔日的荣光。 如果我们选择这条道路，我们将接受基辅罗斯的遗产并认同鲁塞尼亚的文化身份；一个伟大的帝国将重生。

original: The Dalai Lama regards the assembled throng of petty Khans as though they were his trained mastiffs. Through them he knows his dominion over Tibet will be secured; he must only choose how. The safest plan would be to secure a treaty with the Khans, seeking their assurance that they will do their utmost to defend Buddhism in Tibet, in particular the body of the reborn bodhisattva himself.\nA more radical approach has also occurred to the enlightened monk; if the Dalai Lama were to invite one of the Khans to rule as his puppet, he would never need fear resistance from Tibet’s contentious noble families. Ruling from the shadows holds a certain appeal.\nHe turns to the Khans to announce his will, a placid smile hiding his veiled ambition.
translation: 达赖喇嘛把这群小汗看做他训练有素的看家犬。从他们身上，达赖喇嘛知道他对西藏的统治会得到保障，而他只需选择如何去维护统治。最安全的方法是与这些可汗达成一项条约，以寻求他们尽最大努力保护西藏的佛教，特别是转世灵童本身的保证。\n开明的僧侣也采取了更激进的方法；如果达赖喇嘛邀请其中一个汗来做他统治下的傀儡，他就永远不会担心来自西藏反对派贵族家族的抵抗。做幕后统治者具有一定的吸引力。\n他向汗宣布他的意愿，平静的微笑隐藏着他蒙着面纱的野心。

original: Establish a rapport with the nomands.
translation: 与游牧民建立融洽关系。

original: Invite the Khalka Mongols to rule.
Invite the Khoshuud Oirats to rule.
Invite the Dzungar Oirats to rule.

Ever since the sack of its capital in 1398 the Delhi Sultanate has been in a constant state of decay. Within short time the sultanates of Bengal, Gujarat, Malwa and even Jaunpur were proclaimed independent by former governors, while our own Sayyid dynasty took the opportunity to seize power over the city itself. Since however we have been unable to consolidate the fracturing sultanate and our direct influence does not extend far from the city walls of Delhi itself.\nThe Lodi family in Sirhind has been our last great supporter. With influence over most of the Afghan nobles in our kingdom they have been able to bring order to the few lands that still remain loyal. In return our predecessors have granted them what influence and power they could. However, with the rise of Bahlul Lodi as the head of the family, Delhi is once again at risk. Word has reached us that Bahlul is planning to march on Delhi, to impose his will on the Sultan and possibly end the Sayyid dynasty.
translation: 自从1398年首都被洗劫，德里苏丹国一直不断衰退。在短时间内，孟加拉、古吉拉特、摩腊婆甚至章普尔的前总督纷纷都宣布独立，而我们赛义德王朝则借机夺取了德里城本身的权力。然而，因为我们无法联合分崩离析的苏丹国，我们的政令出不了德里城。\n在西尔欣德的洛迪家族是我们最重要的支持者。他们对王国中大多数阿富汗贵族保有影响，所以能够为那些仍然保持忠诚的少数土地带来秩序。作为回报，我们的前任已经授予他们足够的影响力和权力。然而，随着巴赫卢尔·洛迪成为家族首领，德里再次面临风险。有消息说，巴赫卢尔计划进军德里，将他的意志强加于苏丹并可能结束赛义德王朝。

original: We must rein these traitors in!
translation: 我们必须控制这些叛徒！

original: §RSirhind is likely to declare war on Delhi.§!
translation: §R西尔欣德可能会向德里宣战。§!

original: Offer the Lodis full independence as rulers of the Sirhind.\n
translation: 给予洛迪家族完全独立，让他们成为西尔欣德的统治者。\n

original: If Sirhind accepts they will be independent.
translation: 如果西尔欣德接受，他们将可以独立。

original: As governor of the Punjab, and as one of the last remaining supporters of the Sayyid Sultans of Delhi, [Root.Monarch.GetName] is one of the most influential landholders in Northern India. [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] has also emerged as the informal leader of most of the Afghan nobles within the sultanate and many consider [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] more powerful than the Sultan [DLH.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself].\nIt is therefore no wonder that [Root.Monarch.GetName] has watched the incompetence of the Delhi Sultans with disgust.
translation: 作为旁遮普总督，德里赛义德苏丹的最后的支持者之一，[Root.Monarch.GetName]是印度北部最有影响力的领主之一。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]也成为苏丹国内大多数阿富汗贵族的非正式领导人，许多人认为[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]比苏丹[DLH.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]更强大。\n难怪[Root.Monarch.GetName]对德里苏丹的无能十分厌恶。

original: Time has run out for the Sayyid Dynasty!
translation: 赛义德王朝的时间已经不多了！

original: The Lodis will remain loyal subjects.
translation: 洛迪家族仍然会是忠心的臣民。

original: Recognizing the ambition and ability of our leader, [Root.Monarch.GetName] the sultans of Delhi have dropped all pretentions of being our overlord. Instead they have sent us a token of their appreciation and asked that we go forward as close friends in the hostile environment of Northern India.
translation: 德里苏丹[Root.Monarch.GetName]承认我们领袖的雄心和才干，放弃了征服我们的豪言壮语。相反，他们表达了感谢并要求我们在印度北部的敌对环境中携手前进。

original: The city of Agra has been founded on the bank of the Yamuna River thanks to our policy of urban development in the region. Already a major center of population and trade, the prospect of moving the capital to Agra is appealing.
translation: 多亏了我们的城市发展政策，阿格拉城已在雅穆纳河畔建立，并且业已成为一个主要的人口及贸易中心。迁都阿格拉的前景看起来颇为诱人。

original: The Emissaries return with good news

Sensing weakness in Wallachian rule, a claimant to the Principality has returned at the head of an army after living for years in Turkish captivity. Vlad Draculesti, Son of the Dragon, is a man of a bloodthirsty and cruel disposition. His arrival was marked by the gruesome impalement of the ambassadors sent to negotiate with him, making it clear that he will do great violence to any who resist his rule.
translation: 感到瓦拉几亚统治的薄弱，在土耳其被囚禁多年过后，公国的宣称者回到了军队的指挥部。弗拉德三世，这个被称为龙之子的人嗜血且残暴。他的到来标志着被派去与他谈判的大使们都受到了阴森可怖的刺刑，也明确表示着他将对任何反对他统治的人施加巨大的暴力。

original: The assembled retinue ready their pikes and their stomachs for the coming judgment. The brutal impalement of the Ottoman court begins. \n[TUR.Heir.GetTitle] [TUR.Heir.GetName] grimaces as he is forced to watch the horrific display; [TUR.Heir.GetHerHis] eyes fill with terror as the realization dawns that [TUR.Heir.GetSheHe] is next.
translation: 随从们已经聚集起来，准备好了他们的长矛和他们的胃，准备迎接即将到来的审判。奥斯曼宫廷的残暴刺刑开始了。\n被强迫观看这场惨剧的[TUR.Heir.GetTitle][TUR.Heir.GetName]脸上露出了扭曲的表情，[TUR.Heir.GetHerHis]眼中透出强烈的恐惧，意识到下一个就是[TUR.Heir.GetSheHe]自己。

original: The assembled retinue ready their pikes and their stomachs for the coming judgment. The brutal impalement of the Ottoman court begins.
translation: 聚集的随从们准备好了他们的长矛和他们的胃，准备迎接即将到来的审判。奥斯曼宫廷的残暴刺刑开始了。

original: Their gruesome end was well deserved.
translation: 他们可怕的结局是罪有应得。

original: The cruel barbarians of [From.Country.GetName] have murdered our noble [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] alongside [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] children and harem in a most inhuman fashion. Their bodies stand impaled on a hill overlooking the burning city of [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 残忍的[From.Country.GetName]野蛮人以最不人道的方式杀害了我们高贵的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]以及[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]孩子和妻妾。他们的尸体被刺穿在山丘上，俯瞰着燃烧的都市[Root.Capital.GetName]。

original: These monstrous savages will pay for this!
translation: 这些可怕的野蛮人将为此付出代价！

original: We must honor our obligations, even if it pains us.
translation: 我们必须履行我们的承诺，即使这会让我们痛苦万分。

original: Following a hard-fought campaign, the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has called for a Kurultai at the recently conquered city of Soltanieh. An assembly of generals and lesser Khans gathers outside a most auspicious location; the Mausoleum of the Ilkhan Oljeitu.\nSpeaking before the Kurultai, [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] raises the pressing question of how Iran is to be ruled; [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] gestures toward the Mausoleum and boldly proposes that the Ilkhanate should be restored. Invoking the legacy of the great Mongol Empire and the conquests of Genghis Khan, [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] makes a compelling case for the revival of the subordinate Khanate.
translation: 一场恶战之后，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在刚刚征服的苏丹尼耶召开了库里尔台大会。将军和小汗王们在最神圣的地点：伊利汗完者都的陵墓前被集合起来。\n在库里尔台发言之前，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]提出了有关如何统治伊朗的问题。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]向陵墓致意，并大胆地提出应该恢复伊利汗国，继承蒙古帝国的遗产和成吉思汗的伟大征服，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]的发言令人看到了对汗国复兴的希望。

original: We can rule Persia on our own.
translation: 我们可以自己统治波斯。
支持摩尔达维亚的罗曼

original: The throne of Moldavia was once shared between the brothers Stefan and Ilias after an indecisive battle left neither of them with the power to overthrow the other. After nearly a decade of cold cooperation, Ilias was caught plotting to once again seize the throne for himself, but was discovered  by Stefan who had his eyes gouged out.\nIlias sought refuge in Poland, where he had once been imprisoned, and vowed revenge against Stefan. Though he died shortly after, his son Roman has donned his father's mantle and now seeks Polish support for his own bid for the Moldavian throne. Should we support his efforts, Roman promises that the Principality of Moldavia will pledge itself as a subject of Poland in perpetuity.
translation: 摩尔达维亚的王位曾经在斯特凡和伊利亚斯兄弟之间分享，经过一场优柔寡断的战斗，他们都没有能够推翻对方的力量。经过近十年的冷淡合作，伊利亚斯被发现密谋再次为自己夺取王位，但被斯特凡发现，斯特凡挖出了他的眼睛。\n伊利亚斯在波兰寻求庇护，他曾在那里被囚禁，并发誓要报复斯特凡。虽然他不久后去世，但他的儿子罗曼已经继承了他父亲的衣钵，现在寻求波兰支持他自己夺取摩尔达维亚王位。如果我们支持他的努力，罗曼承诺摩尔达维亚公国将永远臣服于波兰。
用金币资助罗曼的努力。

original: We should not interfere in Moldavian affairs.
translation: 我们不应该干预摩尔达维亚的事务。

original: The throne of Moldavia was once shared between the brothers Stefan and Ilias after an indecisive battle left neither of them with the power to overthrow the other. After nearly a decade of cold cooperation, Ilias was caught plotting to once again seize the throne for himself, but was discovered  by Stefan who had his eyes gouged out.\nIlias sought refuge in Poland, where he had once been imprisoned, and vowed revenge against Stefan. Though Ilias died shortly after, his son Roman has donned his father's mantle and has secured Polish support in his bid for the Moldavian throne.\nRoman has promised to swear fealty to Poland on behalf of the Principality of Moldavia, ending our independence but guaranteeing Polish protection. Poland is not the only interested party however. [Root.Monarch.GetName] currently shares the throne with his brother Petru who has close ties with the lords of Hungary. We therefore might escape Polish rule by seeking Hungarian support, though it would likely come at the same cost.
translation: 摩尔达维亚的王位曾经在斯特凡和伊利亚斯兄弟之间分享，经过一场优柔寡断的战斗，他们都没有能够推翻对方的力量。经过近十年的冷淡合作，伊利亚斯被发现密谋再次为自己夺取王位，但被斯特凡发现，斯特凡挖出了他的眼睛。\n伊利亚斯在波兰寻求庇护，他曾在那里被囚禁，并发誓要报复斯特凡。虽然他不久后去世，但他的儿子罗曼已经继承了他父亲的衣钵，并得到了波兰支持他自己夺取摩尔达维亚王位。\n罗曼承诺在成为摩尔达维亚大公后臣服于波兰以换取保护。但波兰并不是唯一感兴趣的势力，[Root.Monarch.GetName]现在和他的兄弟佩特鲁分享王位，后者和匈牙利的领主们关系紧密。我们也许可以通过匈牙利人的帮助来逃离波兰人的统治，但也很可能因此而成为匈牙利的臣属。

original: We can crush this pretender ourselves!
translation: 我们可以自己摧毁这个篡权者！

original: Roman of Moldavia has successfully seized the throne with Polish support. As promised, he declares that the Principality will henceforth be subject to Poland in perpetuity.
translation: 摩尔达维亚的罗曼在波兰的支持下成功夺取了王位。正如他所承诺的，他宣布摩尔达维亚公国从此将永远臣服于波兰。

original: Roman, the candidate we supported for the Moldavian throne, has been thwarted in his efforts through Hungarian intervention. Roman was captured in battle and must now share the same fate as his late father; blinded and broken, he limps back to Poland to live the rest of his days as a failed prince.
translation: 我们支持的摩尔达维亚王位的候选人罗曼，他的努力在匈牙利的干预下受挫。罗曼在战斗中被俘，现在必须经历和他已故的父亲一样的命运；他又瞎又伤，一瘸一拐地回到波兰，作为一个失败的王子度过余生。

original: Our support of the the Moldavian Prince Roman was for naught as the Principality rallies behind [MOL.Monarch.GetName], its lords determined to resist foreign overlordship. Though Roman refuses to abandon his quest, it is clear that Moldavia will not willingly submit to Polish rule.
translation: 我们对摩尔达维亚王子罗曼的支持是徒劳的，因为这个公国团结一致支持[MOL.Monarch.GetName]，其贵族决心抵制外国的统治。虽然罗曼拒绝放弃他的追求，但很明显摩尔达维亚不愿意服从波兰的统治。
这些多管闲事的马扎儿人真该死！
摩尔达维亚寻求匈牙利的支持

original: Backed by the Kingdom of Poland, Prince Roman of Moldavia has launched a bid for the Moldavian throne. The Lords of Moldavia refuse to submit to Polish rule and have elected to pledge themselves to Hungary instead, in exchange for our protection against further Polish interference in their affairs.
translation: 在波兰王国的支持下，摩尔达维亚王子罗曼已经开始争夺摩尔达维亚王位。摩尔达维亚的贵族拒绝服从波兰的统治，而是选择向匈牙利宣誓，以换取我们的保护，不让波兰进一步干涉他们的事务。

original: Despite our best efforts we have been unable to curtail the Prussian Confederation's efforts to undermine [Root.GetAdjective] rule. The cities that pledged their support to the Confederation have rallied an army and have risen up in open revolt. As we suspected, many of its members have ties to Poland and have already requested Polish intervention in the coming conflict. It seems that a bloody struggle in Prussia is unavoidable unless we renounce our rule over these cities.
translation: 尽管我们尽了最大的努力，我们仍然无法阻止普鲁士联盟破坏[Root.GetAdjective]统治的努力。那些承诺支持联盟的城市集结了一支军队，并在公开起义中奋起反抗。正如我们所怀疑的，它的许多成员与波兰有联系，并且已经要求波兰干预即将到来的冲突。除非我们放弃对这些城市的统治，否则普鲁士的血腥斗争似乎是不可避免的。

original: The Prussian Federation will ask for Polish Support
translation: 普鲁士联邦将寻求波兰的支持

original: This is not a war we can win.
translation: 这不是一场我们能赢得的战争。

original: The Prussian Confederation Seeks Polish Support
translation: 普鲁士联邦寻求波兰的支持

original: An organization calling itself the Prussian Confederation has risen up against the injustices of Teutonic rule, and have rallied an army in Danzig. We have previously given its members quiet assurances that we would support their cause should it come to open war. In exchange, the Confederation has agreed that the Prussian lands should be ruled by Poland after the tyrannical Knights have been expelled. We have much to gain from this arrangement, but we should be prepared for a bloody struggle.
translation: 一个自称为普鲁士联盟的组织已经起来反对条顿统治的不公正，并在但泽召集了一支军队。我们以前曾向其成员保证，如果战争爆发，我们会支持他们的事业。作为交换，联盟已经同意在暴虐的骑士被驱逐后，普鲁士的土地应该由波兰统治。我们可以从这种安排中获益匪浅，但我们应该为血腥的斗争做好准备。

original: They shall have our full support. To battle!
translation: 他们将得到我们的全力支持。去战斗吧！

original: This is no business of ours.

The war against the Teutonic Knights has finally come to an end. [Root.Monarch.GetName] sits at the peace table with the leaders of the Prussian Confederation and raises a glass to toast our mutual victory and future cooperation.\nThe treaty is signed quickly and with confidence; the rights and privileges of the Prussian townships, clergy, burghers, and knights shall be preserved, and the cause they fought for recognized as a just struggle against autocracy. Over time, the cities of the Confederation will be incorporated fully into the Crown of Poland.
translation: 对抗条顿骑士的战争终于结束了。[Root.Monarch.GetName]与普鲁士联盟领导人一起坐在和平桌旁，举杯为我们共同的胜利和未来的合作干杯。\n条约迅速和信心十足地被签署；普鲁士城镇、神职人员、市民和骑士的权利和特权将得到保护，他们为之奋斗的事业将被视为与独裁统治的正义斗争。随着时间的推移，联盟的城市将完全并入波兰的王室。

original: The Teutonic Order finds itself plagued with unrest and conspiracy. A new organization has appeared to challenge Teutonic rule, despite our recent outing of the Lizard League which sought to invite Poland to rule Kulm. Calling themselves the Prussian Confederation this union of burghers, knights, and noblemen declare that their purpose is to unite against injustice and arbitrary rule. If this treason were not enough, it is known that many among their number have Polish sympathies, and like their predecessors might attempt to invite Polish rule over Prussia if their influence is not curtailed. Worryingly, they have already found significant support among the burghers of West Prussia.
translation: 条顿骑士团发现自己受到动乱和阴谋的困扰。尽管我们最近出现了寻求邀请波兰统治库尔姆的蜥蜴联盟，但是一个新的组织似乎挑战了条顿统治。这个自称普鲁士联盟，由市民，骑士和贵族组成的联盟宣称他们的目的是团结反对不公正和随意统治的力量。如果这种叛国行为还不够，众所周知，他们中的许多人都得到波兰人的同情，就像他们的前任一样，如果他们的影响不受限制，可能会试图邀请波兰统治普鲁士。令人担忧的是，他们已经在西普鲁士的市民中找到了关键的支持。
我们必须制止这些叛徒。

original: Allow them to settle in exchange for military service.
translation: 允许他们以服兵役来换取定居权。

original: Drive them out of our lands!
translation: 把他们驱逐出我们的土地！

original: [Root.GetName] has secured a monopoly on the export of wool from Merino flocks. This fine wool is prized in markets from Seville to Flanders, and is an important cornerstone of the [Root.GetAdjective] economy. The ranchers, mostly nobles and clergy, have organized themselves into the ‘Mesta’, an association promoting their interests at court and in local governance. Their influence ensures that it remains a serious crime to export sheep of this breed outside of [Root.GetName].
translation: [Root.GetName]确保垄断了美丽诺羊毛出口。这种羊毛从塞维利亚到弗兰德斯炙手可热，是[Root.GetAdjective]经济的基础来源。牧场主大部分是贵族和牧师，他们组织加入了「梅斯塔」——提高宫廷和当地政府利润的协会。由于它们的影响，出口在[Root.GetName]之外饲养的美丽诺绵羊成为重罪。

original: The Mesta, a powerful association of sheep ranchers, are facing new challenges to their rural privileges; textile manufacturers argue that their use of land is wasteful and stifles new development. The price of Merino wool has dropped somewhat since the height of Mesta influence, weakening their political leverage. Though the economic importance of the Mesta has already waned, the nobles and clergy that make up their membership continue to wield a great deal of influence at court, and demand that their privileges be upheld regardless of the changing circumstances.
translation: 梅斯塔，一个强大的牧羊人协会，正面临着农村特权的新挑战。纺织品生产者认为他们浪费了土地的使用，制约了新的发展。自梅斯塔影响力升高以来，美利奴羊毛的价格有所下降，削弱了他们的政治影响力。虽然梅斯塔对经济已不再那么重要，但其成员贵族和神职人员继续在宫廷发挥了很大的影响力，并在任何情况下要求控制特权。

original: The §YClergy§! and §YNobles§! estates will be removed from this province if present.
translation: §Y教士§!和§Y贵族§!如果存在将会从该省份被移除。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] pauses [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] survey of the battlefield to momentarily regard the burning city of [TUR.Capital.GetName] with an unsettling dispassion.\n[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] assembled retinue ready their pikes and their stomachs for the coming judgment. The soldiers raise the beaten and broken body of [TUR.Monarch.GetTitle] [TUR.Monarch.GetName] from [TUR.Monarch.GetHerHis] slumped position on the ground and prop him upright. The once majestic [TUR.Monarch.GetTitle] lets out a final chilling scream as the stake impales [TUR.Monarch.GetHerHis] heart and emerges out of his back.\n[TUR.Heir.GetTitle] [TUR.Heir.GetName] grimaces as he is forced to watch the horrific display; [TUR.Heir.GetHerHis] eyes fill with terror as the realization dawns that [TUR.Heir.GetSheHe] is next.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]停下了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]对战场的视察，以一种令人不安的冷静注视着[TUR.Capital.GetName]燃烧的废墟。\n[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]的随从已经聚集起来，准备好了他们的长矛和他们的胃，准备迎接即将到来的审判。士兵们用长矛将[TUR.Monarch.GetTitle][TUR.Monarch.GetName]从[TUR.Monarch.GetHerHis]的位置挑了起来。曾经的[TUR.Monarch.GetTitle]在长矛穿过他的心脏，从[TUR.Monarch.GetHerHis]的背后透出时发出了最后的惨叫。\n被强迫观看这场惨剧的[TUR.Heir.GetTitle][TUR.Heir.GetName]脸上露出了扭曲的表情，[TUR.Heir.GetHerHis]眼中透出强烈的恐惧，意识到下一个就是[TUR.Heir.GetSheHe]自己。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] pauses [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] survey of the battlefield to momentarily regard the burning city of [TUR.Capital.GetName] with an unsettling dispassion. [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] assembled retinue ready their pikes and their stomachs for the coming judgment. The soldiers raise the beaten and broken body of [TUR.Monarch.GetTitle] [TUR.Monarch.GetName] from [TUR.Monarch.GetHerHis] slumped position on the ground and prop him upright. The once majestic [TUR.Monarch.GetTitle] lets out a final chilling scream as the stake impales [TUR.Monarch.GetHerHis] heart and emerges out of his back.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]停下了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]对战场的视察，以一种令人不安的冷静注视着[TUR.Capital.GetName]燃烧的废墟。[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]的随从已经聚集起来，准备好了他们的长矛和他们的胃，准备迎接即将到来的审判。士兵们用长矛将[TUR.Monarch.GetTitle][TUR.Monarch.GetName]从[TUR.Monarch.GetHerHis]的位置挑了起来。曾经的[TUR.Monarch.GetTitle]在长矛穿过他的心脏，从[TUR.Monarch.GetHerHis]的背后透出时发出了最后的惨叫。

original: The assembled retinue ready their pikes and their stomachs for the coming judgment. The soldiers raise the beaten and broken body of [TUR.Monarch.GetTitle] [TUR.Monarch.GetName] from [TUR.Monarch.GetHerHis] slumped position on the ground and prop him upright. The once majestic [TUR.Monarch.GetTitle] lets out a final chilling scream as the stake impales [TUR.Monarch.GetHerHis] heart and emerges out of his back.\n[TUR.Heir.GetTitle] [TUR.Heir.GetName] grimaces as he is forced to watch the horrific display; [TUR.Heir.GetHerHis] eyes fill with terror as the realization dawns that [TUR.Heir.GetSheHe] is next.
translation: 随从已经聚集起来，准备好了他们的长矛和他们的胃，准备迎接即将到来的审判。士兵们用长矛将[TUR.Monarch.GetTitle][TUR.Monarch.GetName]从[TUR.Monarch.GetHerHis]的位置挑了起来。曾经的[TUR.Monarch.GetTitle]在长矛穿过他的心脏，从[TUR.Monarch.GetHerHis]的背后透出时发出了最后的惨叫。\n被强迫观看这场惨剧的[TUR.Heir.GetTitle][TUR.Heir.GetName]脸上露出了扭曲的表情，[TUR.Heir.GetHerHis]眼中透出强烈的恐惧，意识到下一个就是[TUR.Heir.GetSheHe]自己。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] pauses [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] survey of the battlefield to momentarily regard the burning city of [TUR.Capital.GetName] with an unsettling dispassion.\n [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] assembled retinue ready their pikes and their stomachs for the coming judgment. The brutal impalement of the Ottoman court begins.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]停下了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]对战场的视察，以一种令人不安的冷静注视着[TUR.Capital.GetName]燃烧的废墟。\n[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]的随从已经聚集起来，准备好了他们的长矛和他们的胃，准备迎接即将到来的审判。奥斯曼宫廷的残暴刺刑开始了。

The brutal impalement of the Ottoman court begins. \n[TUR.Heir.GetTitle] [TUR.Heir.GetName] grimaces as he is forced to watch the horrific display; [TUR.Heir.GetHerHis] eyes fill with terror as the realization dawns that [TUR.Heir.GetSheHe] is next.
